name: Cylinder: Puzzles Returned
summary: A puzzle game developed by Mighty Rabbit Studios.

name: Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road
summary: A brand new Inazuma Eleven game, returning to its roots! Play through the story mode with a new protagonist, and meet all characters from the series' long history in chronicle mode!

name: Satisfactory
summary: Satisfactory is an FPS open-world factory building sim. You play as an engineer on an alien planet tasked to complete ‘Project Assembly’ - a massive machine for a mysterious purpose. Conquer nature, build multi-story factories, and automate to satisfaction!

name: Robot Rumble 2
summary: Build your robot. Battle your robot. Robot Rumble 2 is a robot combat game where you create your robot from real-world parts, then drive it in the arena to defeat other robots.

name: Evotinction
summary: Evotinction is a third-person stealth game featuring unique hacking mechanics. The developers share an enormous passion for the stealth genre and wish to provide a complex and dynamic stealth experience for players. A variety of hacking skills, environment devices and gadgets provide rich emergent gameplay.

name: Selfloss
summary: Selfloss is an emotional exploration game filled with rich lore, set in a whale-worshipping, Slavic-inspired world. Embark on the journey of the healer, Kazimir, and his magical staff as he fights a mysterious Miasma in search of a ritual to cure his wounded soul.

name: Waifu Wars Online
summary: Kill, loot, and level up with other players in this mysterious online realm. Welcome to WAIFU WARS ONLINE!

name: Necro Story
summary: A creature-collection RPG where you play as a powerful necromancer. Summon hordes of undead and upgrade your necromancy spells to defeat your enemies. Capture their souls to enlist them in your team, and sign pacts with demons to gain their tremendous powers.

name: Rum & Gun
summary: Journey across the Indian Ocean, uncover the secrets of the Drunken God, and become a legendary pirate captain. Rum & Gun mixes fast-paced shooter action with light ARPG elements. You're not on the Caribbean anymore...

name: Elsie
summary: Elsie is an indie action-platformer filled with rogue-like mechanics such as perma-death, procedurally generated levels, and a wide scope of items and weaponry to make each run as unique as possible.

name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
summary:
Are you ready for a third-person, hoverboarding hack & Slash with lots of blood, toys, glitter and adorable cuteness? Then Gori Cuddly Carnage is perfect for you!

Master explosive weaponry and devastating combos in an epic battle to prevent the Adorable Army from conquering the galaxy, and rescue Professor Y, their missing creator and only human who showed Gori and his friends love. Push your combat and platforming skills to the limits as you fight your way through twisted landscapes filled with environmental hazards, razor-sharp adult humour and a bone-crunching, pulse-pounding soundtrack.

These reluctant heroes must track down and obliterate the generals of the Adorable Army, and with the help of a wild cast of unlikely allies - discover the truth about Cool-Toyz Inc. and unravel the secrets of this thrilling, action-packed hack ‘n’ slash adventure. Get ready to unleash the cuddly carnage!

name: Peglin
summary: Peglin is a Pachinko Roguelike - Fight enemies by collecting special orbs and popping pegs to deal damage. Acquire special relics that radically change the game and ensure no two runs are the same. Aim carefully to survive in this unique turn-based RPG!

name: RP7
summary: RP7 is a slot-managing roguelike. Instead of character control, you can roll seven random encounter slots to create your character's journey. Roll and re-roll each step of your journey as you plan ahead. With one simple mechanic, you'll experience infinite RPG gameplay. Fight monsters, gather golds, be more strong, and find your missing pet frog!

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown
summary: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown is an open world driving and lifestyle experience. Grab your keys and live your life of luxury. Remember, social status is everything In the world of Test Drive Unlimited.

name: Caravan SandWitch
summary: Embark on a journey across vast landscapes in Caravan SandWitch, a captivating narrative-driven exploration adventure game.

name: Marmoreal
summary: Marmoreal is a Bullet Hell Action RPG with magical girls, swords and fully automatic crossbows. Join the Mages of the Arcanum and the Warriors of Melkirion in their quest to stop the evil Necromancer!

name: Sekrets of the Dungeon
summary: Sekrets of the Dungeon - a 2D platformer in the genre of Dungeon Crawler, where you have to try to solve all the secrets of the dungeon, losing yourself, without stepping aside... And go home!

name: Perennial Order
summary: Perennial Order is an atmospheric One-Hit-Death Boss Rush, set in a verdant Dark Age world. Explore a lore-filled and eldritch land alone or with a friend. Slay nature-infested horrors, creatures, and titans, all in a painterly 2D style.

name: Stardiver
summary:
Stardiver is a sci-fi, single-player, action-adventure game where you pilot a ship, fight enemies, and slay Bosses. The game takes place entirely underwater.

Stardiver will take you to an unknown world in which you’ll experience exciting fights, and discover new species and places. And you’ll take care of resources supply, crafting items in your base, and developing your own ship.

name: Nocturne
summary: The afterlife is now digital. Discover that eternal life comes with sacrifice in a genre-defying RPG with unique rhythm combat.

name: Core Keeper
summary: Explore an endless cavern of creatures, relics and resources in a mining sandbox adventure for 1-8 players. Mine, build, fight, craft and farm to unravel the mystery of the ancient Core.

name: Demon's Mirror
summary: A rogue like deck builder combined with a strategic match-3 battler. Use cards to attack and defend against the enemy, manipulate tiles on the board, and gain ever increasing powers as you traverse into a world filled with your worst nightmares.

name: Koboo: The Tree Spirit
summary: An action rogue-lite platformer with strategy and RPG elements. Play as a tree spirit named 'Koboo' as you befriend animals and protect the ancient forest against hunters and an ever expanding industry seeking to destroy it.

name: Life as Designed
summary: A feeling of being typecast and a dwindling motivation to work leaves Cho Fukuda questioning her career as a freelance costume designer. To get out of this rut, Cho and her girlfriend search for a new calling she can devote herself to.

name: World's Worst Handyman
summary: Suit up as the "World's Worst Handyman" in this comedy stealth game where every job is a chaotic adventure! Dodge disgruntled clients, bungle repairs, and save your beloved animal shelter from bankruptcy.

name: Vesper: Ether Saga
summary: The perfect union between video games and comics.

name: Nikhil Murthy's Syphilisation
summary: Nikhil Murthy's Syphilisation is a post-colonial 4X game where you play a student doing a group report on Gandhi, Churchill and the Raj. It eXplores space left uncharted by the genre and so proposes alternatives to established systems.

name: Cyberrrevolution
summary: cybeRRRevolution (cyber-R-revolution) is an Indigenous action-adventure cyberpunk game about bartering with monsters, piloting godly mechas, and taking down bandits to secure a prosperous future for a nation of colonized peoples. Play as Sepsis, Rebel, or Barrett, each working toward a common goal of Recovery, Reconnection, and Rebuild.

name: Battle Gem Ponies
summary:
A super-powered, shapeshifting pony RPG.

Command a super-powered, shape-shifting pony in this RPG Adventure! In a world where unpredictable legendary beasts pose an existential threat, you'll embark on a journey across the Pinto region to become the best pony tamer in the world and protect your magical companion from those who want to use her as a secret weapon.

Customize your team with hundreds of different moves, stat arrangements, & collectible battle gear to gain the upper hand in this rapid-switchout Rock/Paper/Scissors combat system.

A years-in-the-making love letter to the My Little Pony & Pokémon communities, celebrating one year of progress since the successful Kickstarter campaign!

name: Indie Dev Story
summary:
Quit your job to become an indie developer and make your first game!

A short single-player 'clicker' game which tries to mimic the frantic feeling of being an indie developer; make your game while trying to stay healthy, social and earning enough money to pay the bills.

How will your game do when it releases?

name: Bloodless
summary: Stylish retro, action-adventure game featuring fast-paced combat centered around ronin Tomoe's signature dash-counter mechanic, fighting with nothing but her bare fists to disarm her former allies, the samurai army of Shogun Akechi.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II
summary: The galaxy is in peril. Entire worlds are falling. The Imperium needs you. Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine, the greatest of the Emperor's warriors, with Clive Standen (Vikings, Taken) as the iconic Captain Titus. Unleash deadly abilities and an arsenal of devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid hordes. Hold at bay the horrors of the galaxy in epic battles on far-flung planets. Uncover dark secrets and drive back the everlasting night to prove your ultimate loyalty to humanity.

name: Eternal Tombs
summary: Eternal Tombs is an MMORPG Run By Live Dungeon Masters

name: Hard Glide
summary: This is an arcade-style inertial skill-shooter with mouse control only.

name: Railroad Corporation 2
summary: Railroad Corporation 2 is a train tycoon game set at the turn of the 20th century, where you take on the mantle of a railroad magnate to start your new railroad corporation. Seize the opportunity of railroad electrification to lead the charge in the new era of trains. Strategize as you lay tracks, balance finances, deploy locomotives to ferry goods across vast landscapes, and outpace the competition.

name: Chef RPG
summary: Craft your culinary adventure in a beautiful pixel art world. Manage your restaurants, forage and hunt for ingredients, befriend locals, and grow your culinary empire. What kind of chef will you be?

name: Stay with Me!: An Alien Abduction Story
summary: Psychological horror game with a first person view, you will play a young woman who has lost her way and who apparently has been kidnapped by beings that are not from this world

name: Xpressorcist
summary: A Exorcism Simulator! Take the role of an Xpressorcist (Express Exorcist) and exorcise as many people as possible with out running out of time and accidentally blowing them up!!

name: Melobot: A Last Song
summary: Immerse yourself in the dreamlike world of Melobot - A Last Song, an adventure, action, and rhythm game that thrusts you into a heroic quest to save a planet plagued by a strange disease. You play as Melobot, a lovable musical robot originally designed for peace, and awaken to a vital mission: revive the planet’s unique flora by recreating their songs and overcoming the challenges set by powerful guardians.

name: Walter Walnut
summary: Glide, collect nuts and slap birds in this small 3d adventure. Play as Walter Walnut, a gliding squirrel with a part time delivery job, and make your way to the delivery location.

name: Farmer Against Potatoes Idle
summary: Pick up your sword and fight off waves of Potatoes by upgrading your stats constantly, use Equipment, choose between different Classes, put your many Talents to good use, and so much more designed to keep you entertained for a long time.

name: Voltaire: The Vegan Vampire
summary: An action-farming-roguelite, full of whimsical flora and mischievous creatures that really want to ruin your dark and mysterious plans of… Going vegan!

name: Cato: Buttered Cat
summary: Buttered cat paradox puzzle platformer game

name: Ghost Girl Lasling
summary: This is a story of Lasling, a talented genius teenage girl with amazing working abilities, who becomes a ghost after an accident. The only person in the world she is visible to is Mofft, the male main protagonist. Their meeting is as if a fateful encounter and love story begins.

name: Paws for Adventure
summary: Hunt, Fight and Meow your way to saving the cat colonies. A purrrfect adventure for cat lovers.

name: The Abandoned Planet
summary: A throw-back, retro-inspired, point and click adventure with chunky and beautiful pixel art.

name: Plank Builders
summary: “Plank Builders” is a peaceful construction game. Magical marbles have the ability to make stuffed toys come alive. Together with the stuffed toys, the player can plan and construct different buildings made out of small wooden planks.

name: Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open
summary: Third Eye Open is a third person narrative adventure rendered in a distinctive "paper theatre" aesthetic. Set in early 2000s Malaysia, the player takes the role of Ting, a young girl trying to come to terms with the burgeoning power inside her.

name: Corpus Edax
summary: Corpus Edax is a first-person-melee RPG enveloped in an immersive-sim design philosophy. Set in newly built city on a distant planet, create your character and make your own choices in a reactive world - fight, talk or sneak your way out of confrontation. Your decision, is the right decision.

name: Garlant: My Story
summary: I am an adventurer who just graduated from college. In pursuit of the challenge, I came to the distant border of the Kingdom: the town of Garlant in the Doly region. I will write a new chapter in my life here. It will be a wonderful adventure story.

name: Shogun Showdown
summary: Shogun Showdown is a turn-based combat game with rogue-like and deck-building elements. Position yourself and attack at the right time, upgrade your tiles and combo them to get ready to face the Shogun!

name: Lollipop Chainsaw RePop
summary: Lollipop Chainsaw RePop is a remaster of the original. RePOP is a definitive version of the game which leaves the story unchanged, with the focus on quality of life improvements and additional gameplay content.

name: Ninza
summary:
Ninza is a multiplayer fighting game like no other! Instead of directly attacking your opponents, you crush them by pushing pieces of the level. Embrace chaos and dive into an entirely new level of frenzied and creative gameplay, where the environment itself becomes both your weapon and your ennemy.

Each character has a unique moveset and abilities, guaranteeing unexpected outcomes and thrilling comebacks in every battle. The game offers ample room for crafting creative strategies, tricks, and traps. But be warned, becoming a true Ninza master demands great determination. Only the boldest players can rise through the fierce competition and aspire to earn Mo0n's respect.

name: Demolish & Build 3
summary: In Demolish & Build 3 you play as the owner of a demolition company. Accept contracts and complete them yourself or delegate them to your workers. Use powerful equipment, from sledgehammers to giant cranes. Manage your company by hiring workers and buying new vehicles and properties.

name: Reka
summary: Start your life as an apprentice witch to the legendary Baba Jaga and venture across a mysterious, natural landscape with your companion, chicken-legged cottage. Develop your magical powers, customise your home, craft potions, help or hinder villagers find your way in the world.

name: Mexico 1921: A Deep Slumber
summary: Immerse yourself in an emotional and intriguing narrative adventure video game about the awakening of a country.

name: Squirrel with a Gun
summary:
Squirrel with a Gun is a sandbox game that focuses on exploration and shooting combat.
Defend yourself from random encounters with Agents using various weapons. Deflect their melee attacks with exceptional timing to disarm them.
Climb and jump across platforms with your natural squirrel skill. Use weapon recoil to cross even greater gaps. Explore the neighbourhood from a squirrel's eye view.
Talk with residents of the neighbourhood and help them out for goodies. Or mug them for goodies.

name: Edge of Sanity
summary: Set in the unforgiving lands of Alaska, Edge of Sanity is a Lovecraftian survival horror game with unique 2D art, a disturbing story, and complex base management. Gather resources, carefully plan your expeditions and explore the world of madness as you struggle to keep your humanity.

name: Hollowbody
summary:
A tech-noir survival horror short story, set in the urban decay of a long abandoned British city.

It's a Shipper's biggest fear. You're grounded in the exclusion zone, twenty miles of death and decay sealed off by the towering, suffocating walls erected after the collapse.

Play as Mica, an unlicensed black market shipper who will stop at nothing to find her missing partner.

Alone, stranded, and with limited resources at your disposal you'll have to push your way through the zone, solve environmental puzzles, manage resources and fight for your life as you try to find a way to escape beyond the wall.

name: Garbanzo Quest
summary: Garbanzo Quest! The crazy bullet-heck platformer where your main weapon is your own spit! Help Garbanzo (and Pinto if you have a buddy) save their Friends from the evil Billi' Bones and his wacky world full of hand-crafted challenges, secrets, and branching paths!

name: Pandecrown
summary: Killomnia collapsed in 2019 after the virus escaped from the Medical Hospital in Laucthi City, which held the corporation liable for compensation in the Laucthi City Incident in 2019. The verdict led to bankruptcy, causing them and their subsidiaries to close for the year Following.

name: Deitrus
summary: In Deitrus, heroes are forced to fight for the sake of their techno fantasy world through fast-paced, grid-based, combat, but not everyone is up to the task…

name: Zero Orders Tactics
summary: Turn-based puzzle strategy, where you can't give any orders. Transform your units and terraform the battlefield, because that's how you control the combat. Turn your horseman into a scout to make him go into a forest. Raise a mountain to block enemy arrows. Press "End Turn"

name: SuperOffice
summary: SuperOffice is an intense top down view shooter experience where time moves only when you move.

name: Enchanted Blacksmith
summary: Take on the role of a blacksmith in the world of the sword and magic. Use your workbench to craft/modify/repair weapons and sell them at your shop. Complete quests to gain experience and money. Craft legendary weapons to seek fortune and Forge Your Legend!

name: Aestik
summary: Make impactful decisions in moral dilemma situations, which will impact the course of your journey through this atmospheric, hand-drawn metroidvania. Explore the hazardous paths of the Realm of Aestik and fight its corrupted inhabitants as you unravel its deep-rooted mysteries.

name: Ovrlrd
summary:
Ovrlrd is a mech combat simulator built from the ground-up for Virtual Reality. Take control of a 50-foot bipedal weapons platform as you carry out complex operations across expansive open maps in a milsim-inspired single-player campaign.

Sit at the controls of a complex war machine, using your virtual hands to manipulate physical buttons, switches, levers, throttles, joysticks and more.

name: Super Company
summary: You will act as an entrepreneur in the 1990s, producing all kinds of goods that citizens need; Providing residential and educational services for citizens; Carry out international trade and upgrade industries. You should choose the right development strategy to grow the company.

name: Gems Defenders
summary: Match 3 Game, Tower Defense Game and Story driven RPG. Gems Defenders have it all! Match enchanted gems to power up your town, heal your heroes, charge powerful spells, defeat the enemies that are storming the gates of your city and uncover lore of the mysterious Aldenor!

name: Super Mario Eclipse
summary: Super Mario Eclipse is part beta restoration, part enhancement, part original mod, and all fan service. With dozens upon dozens of new missions, fully custom worlds, challenging secret courses, and an interconnected Isle Delfino to boot, this is the Super Mario Sunshine experience you always wanted- and then some!

name: Age of Mythology: Retold
summary: Enter the age of gods, heroes, and monsters! Age of Mythology: Retold is a real-time strategy game where myths and humans collide. Secure your domain, command legendary monsters, and call upon the power of the gods to crush your enemies—or band together with friends to defeat the Arena of the Gods.

name: Lamina Island
summary: The legendary hero trainer Evolym has taken on a new pupil. Being cursed as a slime, she will need your assistance. It is up to you to take the promising mage Neemu from zero to hero.

name: ExoColony: Planet Survival
summary: Space-colony simulation game where you have to survive on an unknown planet with your wrecked spaceship. Start a new civilization and terraform the planet. Expand your colony, mine resources, refine them and build a thriving place to survive.

name: CarX Street
summary: Get behind the wheel and explore the large city and its surroundings, from busy city streets to spiral mountain roads and mesmerizing coastal highways. Drift, speed, traffic; be the best & challenge other players in real network races.

name: Atomic Picnic
summary:
Atomic Picnic is a Co-Op Shooter Roguelite based on the new Swarm Survivors genre! Get together with up to 4 friends to fight frenzied monsters and gain experience to upgrade your weapons in an anime-style post-apocalyptic world.

Fight your way together through The Zone, an everchanging labyrinth created after the "Harvest Festival" happened. Unlock an incredible variety of upgrades that can radically change the way you play every time.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Collector's Edition
summary: The collector’s edition of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 includes a statue of Lieutenant Titus fighting a Tyranid, a 64-page hardcover book, a Steelbook, and the the Macragge’s Chosen DLC.

name: Buffet Boss
summary: Cook your way to the top and rule the restaurant scene!

name: Genba no Kizuna
summary: A mesozoic murder mystery, 4 suspects, 1 truth. Investigate, interrogate and present evidence as you set out to unravel the case with your team. Will you be able to accurately determine who took the victim's life? Or will your deductions lead you to arrest someone for a crime they did not commit...?

name: Halls of Torment
summary: Slay hordes of terrifying monsters in this casual roguelite action rpg. Descend into the Halls of Torment where the lords of the underworld await you. Treasures, magic trinkets, and a growing cast of heroes will grant you the power to vanquish the horrors from beyond. How long can you survive?

name: Factor Y
summary:
Factor Y is a relaxing, large-scale, multi-planetary, mega factory automation game.
Mine resources, craft new items and structures via recipes and generate your own, custom building blocks.
Expand your factory to span across multiple planets.

name: Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy
summary: Help the brave adventurer Runa uncover the mysteries buried deep in the Ruins of the ancient Chaikurú civilization, in a classic and epic 3D action-adventure game. Explore a fantasy world inspired by South-American locations, nature and cultures.

name: 99 Fails
summary: Ragequit across Zeebo's bizarre nightmare to music by David Wise. Inspired by games like Celeste, Jump King and Getting over it by Bennett Foddy. Roguelite precision platforming that's easy to play, but very hard to master, featuring different gameplay mechanics & competitive multiplayer.

name: Zombie Within
summary: A Zombie imposter with virus vials slips into a survivor camp protected by a group of defenders and tries to kill the population. 2-6 players exciting social deduction with friends mixed with horror and strategy.

name: StormEdge
summary: StormEdge is a high-stakes action-roguelite adventure with a heavy emphasis on precision and skills! Take the role of one of the bravest talented mages and save the world off the dangerous elemental tempests threatening the civilization.

name: Not For Broadcast: The Timeloop
summary: The nation's first live televised science experiment is going to make you really happy.

name: Smells Like a Mushroom
summary: The Milky Way has become infested with creatures called Magic Mushrooms. To prevent a catastrophe, the brave Carrotado goes into space! Third-person sci-fi shooter with a bizarre story for a single-player and co-op.

name: HolyHunt
summary:
HolyHunt is a roguelike shooter game that unites the nostalgic and fun 8-bit aesthetic with modern and complex shooting mechanics.

Make your way into the church hall to shoot and dash through different species of demons and bosses with unique mechanics that keep challenging your abilities each run.

Buy improvements and different bullets suited to your enemy's weakness and receive blessings from angels as you keep fighting to get even stronger. Trust in your faith and keep shooting to save the world from the doomsday prophecy.

name: GoobnBalloonsDX
summary: Evil forces have invaded Goobstar! Join Goob and his friends on their quest to save the denizens of planet GoobStar from the invading balloon menace in this wacky hand-drawn Shoot em' up, and watch the world grow around you!

name: Coralina: A Memory Tale
summary: A oneiric plot about two girls unraveling the mysteries of Limbo, a land of alchemists, and its other layers: Hell and Purgatory. The second chapter of "Coralina", an indie and retro game, with a charming and original look.

name: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions
summary: Your next chapter takes flight! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Quidditch by playing solo or sharing the magic with friends and family.

name: Funko Fusion
summary: Funko Fusion is a third-person action game that’s all about celebrating fandom. Play with some of your favorite characters from across TV, movies, games, and comics, and explore handcrafted worlds inspired by Jurassic World, Back to the Future, JAWS, The Thing, Chucky, Battlestar Galactica, Hot Fuzz, The Umbrella Academy, Five Nights at Freddy’s, Masters of the Universe, Invincible, and many more!

name: Dynasty Detective
summary: DynastyDetective is a visual Nobel-style mystery story game set in the fictional Joseon Dynasty where monsters appear.

name: Kamikaze Lassplanes
summary: Fly and fall for powerful Lassplanes! Discover a hand-crafted anime VN with story-driven arcade shoot-'em-up gameplay. Take part in a romantic story with drama and comedic elements set in a steampunk Kingdom filled with magic and torn by a brutal war. Decide the fate of your country and heart.

name: Boyhood's End
summary: Boyhood's End is an adventure game following Giovanni, the boy with the lowest human score in the universe, and Campanella, the delinquent genius, and their journey on the galactic railroad regarding the "human" and "inhuman".

name: The Dusk Alliance
summary: The Dusk Alliance is a 1-4-player coop Action/Investigation horror game.

name: Immortal Hunters
summary: Co-op RPG beat 'em up. People killed the underground god, stole his power and built a civilization ruled by the Church which is served by powerful immortal Hunters. Choose your hero, survive the apocalypse, fight, find a reborn god, expose the lies of the Cardinals.

name: Secret Backrooms 2
summary: Secret Backrooms 2, A Sequel that you play as a facility worker that has noclipped through reality. uncover the secrets behind Delta's Experimental Facility and how the backrooms was discovered.

name: Skystrider
summary: Embark on an epic journey in "Skystrider," a 3D action platformer. As a resurrected hero, explore a ruined world, navigating perilous paths amidst clouds and tides. Unleash ancient technology, unravel secrets, and shape your destiny in this captivating adventure.

name: Dark Hours
summary: Dark Hours is a co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your heist has been disrupted by a supernatural event, and your team of robbers is now trapped with an evil entity. Forget your plan, your mission is to survive. Explore and cooperate to find a way out or hide and pray for daylight.

name: PISTA Motorsport
summary: Get behind the wheel! With realistic graphics and physics, a wide selection of Argentine racing cars, and various game modes, it provides an authentic and thrilling racing experience for enthusiasts.

name: Angola '86
summary: The first strategy game to capture the essence of the entire South African Border war, from Omugulugwombashe to UNTAG (Aug'66 - Mar'90)

name: Multitales
summary: Crazy competitive top-down shooter in the multiverse of fairy tales and legends.

name: Crypt Custodian
summary: Crypt Custodian is a charming metroidvania about cleaning up the afterlife. Play as Pluto- a mischievous cat who has died, and is sentenced to be the afterworlds janitor... forever! Hang out with other doomed ghosts, battle beasts, and explore a vastly expansive landscape.

name: Demon Loop
summary: Take on the repeating Loop in this digital board game from the pen of renowned board game author Alexander Pfister! Protect humans from the monsters they had only recently called friends.Wield an increasing deck of cards to master strategy across each unique loop. Build and repair structures, rally villagers to your side and improve your own skills to overcome the demons running wild across the land.

name: Star Trucker
summary: Haul cargo, trade salvage and keep your space suit close as you search for fame and fortune among the stars in a game that puts an interstellar twist on the truck sim genre.

name: Star Wars Outlaws
summary: Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

name: Towerborne
summary: The Belfry stands as a beacon of hope and safety amongst the ruins of humanity and the City of Numbers, with monsters lurking right outside the tower’s walls. You are an Ace, born anew from the spirit realm with the skills, the grit, and the determination to protect the people of the Belfry.

name: Toy Shire
summary: Are you prepared for a thrilling toy army tower defense adventure? Welcome The Toy Shire! Battle diverse foes in various locations, defend your family, and repel foes from your area. Save the world by strengthening your defense with toy towers!

name: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex
summary: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex is a rogue-lite, shoot-em-up made to give you fun and interesting decisions and test you skill in action-packed, bullet-hell gameplay. Choose your crew, upgrade your ship, and explore the unknown depths of the Vortex.

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash
summary: Give heed! Our academy's time-honored Spring Fan Fest will play to a very special event! Behold, the Slapdash Grand Prix! Teams will compete in four exhilarating events! Aim for ultimate glory in Hurtling Hurdles, Blazing Baskets, Dodgeball Demolitions, and Gourmet Gauntlet!

name: Defenders of the Omniverse
summary: Defenders of the Omniverse is a Reverse Bullet Hell Rogue-Lite set in a world between realities, where heroes and monsters from all across space and time face off in the final battle for the fate of the Omniverse!

name: Bunny Battle Nemesis
summary: Sci-fi, bloodthirsty bunnies, and the powers of a goddess at your disposal! This is Bunny Battle Nemesis. Experience intense action, explosions, and chaos as you defend the Bunny Kingdom from certain doom at the hands of a vengeful demigod and her army of mercenaries.

name: Date Z
summary: "Date Z" - a captivating mix of high school drama, romance, and mystery. As a transfer student, your challenge is to navigate relationships and secure a date by Friday to survive a deadly virus outbreak. Unravel the hidden secrets. Every choice you make counts.

name: Paint by Pixel 3
summary: Unleash your creativity and paint your way pixel by pixel!

name: Traxion
summary: Traxion is a cave flyer featuring beautiful pixel art, great music, and sophisticated in-game physics.

name: Together in Between
summary: Together in Between is a first-person adventure-puzzle game. You have been imprisoned in a magic book with your partner, in the same place but in different dimensions. Will you be able to overcome the Wizard King's puzzles, and see your partner again?

name: Lost in Darkness
summary: Lost in Darkness is a 3D top-down horror action game set in the snowy Atlas Mountains of Morocco. Deep in the Moroccan countryside, you are a Royal Gendarmerie motorcyclist who finds himself stranded alone in the woods while investigating the disappearance of a patrol car.

name: AI Kills All Humans
summary: AI Kills All Humans is a Tactical RTS game in which you play as an AI sending robots to kill all humans. You however don't have direct control of your robots, but robots independently decide how to execute your commands, like a general telling troops to attack, but troops themselves decide how.

name: Self Defense Kinda...
summary: Use your brain to defeat several unique fights whether base game or custom community made content! Learn from your defeats and overcome your overwhelming foe in this Boss Rush RPG game! Maybe, you can help Alice escape the BR World and learn true Self Defense! eh, don't count on it.

name: Gah!
summary: Gah! is a minimalist blend of hack 'n' slash and roguelite with low-poly graphics and...a twist.

name: Monster Run: Downfall of the Empire
summary: Monster Run is a dark fantasy beat’em up with roguelite elements. Fight as a giant monster cat protecting your home forest. Destroy massive armies of human soldiers and their allies. Evolve your attacks, master non-human tactics, and discover the joy of breathing fire.

name: Panchin is Frustrated
summary:
You are the all-seeing observer of a pair of roommates, Panchin and Julem. Panchin is an artist struggling with creative block, and thus spends most of their time pacing around the room, or staying distracted.

Click to collect Panchin's Tears of Frustration. The amount of Tears collected during the day affects Panchin's dreams at night.

name: Run Away
summary: Fight against nightmares and survive in a cooperative horror game for 1-3 players. Explore dark locations, and gather resources for survival. Your decisions determine the fate of the heroes and reveal the secrets of this sinister world. Only through teamwork can you conquer this nightmare.

name: Haiyuuenchi no Memento Memoria
summary: An abandoned amusement park in a broken world. It was a paradise called "Lagoon" where children were self-sufficient. A boy working as a mercenary in "Lagoon" happened to meet a silver-haired girl. The wheels of their destiny begin to move.

name: Lost Balloons: Airy mates
summary: "If only I could fly free in that sky..." This is a hard action-adventure game that should be played while holding on to the memories of those days of floating balloons with such thoughts in mind. Easy among the LOST object series by KIMIDORI SOFT, so it is recommended for first-time players.

name: Everlasting Flowers
summary: Everlasting Flowers is the first installment in a series of "cinematic novels" that tells the story of two girls, Mina and Ran, and their struggles and growth as they search for their own approach to life.

name: Dark Galaxy
summary: Dark Galaxy is an action based rogue-like top-down shooter. You pilot a space drone to oppose the insectoid like species called Minaripods and get stronger by travelling to different star systems. Can you free our galaxy from the invaders?

name: Q2 Humanity
summary: he smash hit game “Q REMASTERED”, which became extremely popular amongst users in Japan in early 2023, is now coming back! "Q2 HUMANITY" is finally available as Early Access! In "Q2" the sequel to "Q1" you can play as a character yourself. You can fly, jump, run, draw, grab, throw, and so on.

name: Shadow of the Ninja Reborn
summary: After 34 years in the shadows, prepare to see this legendary action adventure in a new light! Looking and playing better than ever before, Shadow of the Ninja - Reborn is Tengo Project’s remake of a cult classic, that the fans have been waiting for.

name: Endzone 2
summary: Endzone 2 is a post-apocalyptic survival colony builder, where you embark to secure humanities survival after a cataclysmic disaster. Discover and repopulate the last habitable grounds, while the survival of your people hinges on your wits, foresight, and resilience in a harsh and unforgiving world.

name: Monica's Newlywed Life
summary: When Kyle and his party's adventure comes to an abrupt end, Kyle decides to ask Monica to marry him. Starting a new life in the countryside, they must earn a living, and get to know their new home.

name: Lindwyrm
summary: Lindwyrm combines hack‘n‘slay combat, platforming, puzzling and housing in the shell of a rogue-lite action RPG. Crawl into thrilling dungeons, slay epic bosses with your weapon of choice, enhance your hero, and rebuild a destroyed village in this co-op adventure.

name: Z.O.N.A: Origin
summary: Z.O.N.A: Origin is more than a game; it's your deep dive into a post-apocalyptic world. Here, every choice matters. Engage with a varied, enthralling open world, a suspenseful storyline, perilous anomalies, and potent artifacts in this thrilling game.

name: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
summary: Swing, jump, and blast through dimensions in this standalone follow-up to the critically-acclaimed 2D action-platformer Grapple Dog. Zip between action-packed worlds as Pablo and Luna team up to save the cosmos in their own unique ways.

name: The Discrete Era
summary: An Action-Roguelike, multiplayer coop game.

name: Call of Sentinels
summary: Call of Sentinels is an exciting action game where you will have to challenge real evil! Epic battles await you with hordes of diverse enemies and charismatic bosses that will not leave you indifferent.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
summary: A baby-fresh take on retro-inspired gameplay, featuring a unique co-op design, where kids and parents need to stick together to win!

name: Hive Jump 2: Survivors
summary: Become an agent of vengeance in this bullet-heaven action roguelite! You are the lone survivor of your squad, on an alien planet with just your weapon, a jetpack, and the courage to keep fighting. Kill off alien swarms and transform their valuable guts into explosive upgrades and vital utilities.

name: Forest Football
summary: Car football game with multiplayer.

name: Memoriapolis
summary: From Antiquity to the Age of Enlightenment, imagine, build and manage a city capable of spanning almost 2,500 years of history. Transform your explorers' camp into a world-renowned Capital. But beware: Each age brings its own challenges!

name: Line Time
summary: 《Line Time》is a puzzle game based on “controlling the timeline”.

name: Beyond Hanwell
summary: Step into Hanwell and discover a world beyond it. Set in the deeper parts of London, explore Westminster and uncover the truth about the enigmatic stranger known as The Director. Fight with whatever you can find or use the environment to take out Anomolies.

name: Chernobyl Again
summary: Chernobyl Again is an adventure game adjusted for Virtual Reality headsets for a more immersive and engaging experience level. The story full of challenges and turbulence will let the players transform into a character trying to save the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant.

name: Warcana
summary: Warcana is a fantasy inspired base defence, RTS game with a deck-building mechanic. Face hundreds of thousands of unrelenting monsters in a battle royale between 30 other mighty magicians. Build your deck. Prepare your defences. Summon your armies. Survive the onslaught. Be the last one standing.

name: Area93
summary: A journey through Area 93, where a zombie apocalypse occurred.

name: Roborne
summary: Explore and escape the sci-fi robot factory, classified as NR Securities. Are you willing to unveil the secrets of this twisted and corrupted factory?

name: Sandbox World
summary: Welcome to the Sandbox World! Here, you bring your ideas to life: create tanks, airplanes, ships, and anything else – with over 120 unique blocks at your disposal. Engage, defend, and showcase your masterpieces in exhilarating battles that await you!

name: Endless RPG: Untold Tales
summary: Craft a party of diverse characters, each with customizable skills and looks. Explore a living world with dynamic day-night cycles, changing seasons, and diverse biomes. Embark on an epic journey where you shape your destiny as the director of your unique story.

name: Jump Queen
summary: Get to the top in the really challenging platformer Jump Queen! You don't need a hot girl, she's already here. You just need to move up because the fall price is too high. Jump, collect coins, look for secrets and get to the top.

name: Stronghold Siege
summary: Command your army against a relentless demon horde in this intense real-time strategy game. Master strategy and resource management to conquer the enemy's stronghold while defending your own in the ultimate battle for survival.

name: Satellite Odyssey: Prologue
summary: Satellite odyssey: Рrologue - is a short first-person story-driven adventure with horror elements. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of classic science fiction and retro futurism, inspired by Soviet sci-fi films. Your partner is the artificial intelligence "Zarya"

name: Caesar's Revenge
summary: Caesar’s Revenge is a single-player retro FPS set in classical antiquity. Bring retribution to the greedy senator’s that betrayed you. Become the fall of Rome.

name: Take A Leak
summary: Human testing is back in fashion! Solve the puzzles laid out by Toilet Labs in this piss-filled experience. Our state of the art latrine testing facilities ensure you will feel more relief on solving a puzzle than ever before.

name: Debtors' Club
summary: Be the tax collector of a shady city hall in this narrative-driven resource management game. Talk to debtors, manage a team, make difficult choices, and challenge the city's moral decay. It's their money, but it's your job.

name: Go Hell Go: Tsukiotoshiteko
summary: Go Hell Go: Tsukiotoshiteko is an upcoming new RPG by Entergram.

name: Thunder Jumper
summary: Rocket, hook, and pound your way all across the land to destroy Motorhead's evil expansion of factories! Speedrunners beware: There is no max velocity. Can you handle the power of lightning speed?

name: Motel Manager Simulator
summary: Restore an old motel alongside a shop and a gas station. Design, furnish, decorate and rent rooms. provide products for customers and fuel for cars. Hire employees to help you and be the boss of your own empire.

name: Cardboard Fish
summary: Dive into the captivating world of Cardboard Fish! Experience gripping gameplay as Nozzle, the heroic fish, in a physics-based adventure filled with skill challenges and mind-bending puzzles for thrilling progress and achievement.

name: The Hidden Art of Innkeeping
summary: Transform an old farmhouse in a seaside village into a luxurious inn! Meet interesting guests, discover new areas and hidden treasures, configure rooms and amenities, complete mini-quests, uncover secrets, and rejuvenate the struggling village in this simulation-adventure game!

name: Submarine Terror
summary: A sinister entity lurks in the depths. Descend into the abyss and extract knowledge about it.

name: ColorCoordination
summary: ColorCoordination is a puzzle game where you match colored blocks and spaces by moving them in unison. Explore deep, philosophical topics with your AI Assistant "CoCo" and discover more about its purpose - all while solving a myriad of colorful brainteasers!

name: Arcane Blast
summary: Arcane Blast is a fast-paced, action-packed roguelike brimming with sorcery. Master the seven elements, combine them to achieve powerful reactions and face swarms of enemies to help feline Mage Adrian find his way home from a time dungeon.

name: In My Brain
summary: In My Brain is a science fiction action video game about Nano, a nanoparticle that enters people's minds to combat their illnesses. Based on real events.

name: Fowl Damage
summary: Fowl Damage is an atmospheric puzzle platformer where your default jump provides enough fall damage to destroy you! Carefully manage your jumps and falls as you adventure through this chilling, beautiful, and occasionally cute world.

name: Fantasy Senate Simulator
summary: Create a political party, win elections, respond to events, pass laws, govern, create your version of utopia and even go to war with your neighbors in this senate simulator with a fantasy twist.

name: Astro Link
summary: Astro Link is a Portal-like puzzle game that takes place withing the mysterious Astro Link facility. What is happening to this place? Will test subject #602 be able to find out?

name: Back to the Fooker: Zombie Fooker 2
summary: No persons under the age of 18 permitted.Join Doug Fooker, Nunya Bidness, and Kim Aginavi as they try to cure the zombie virus by going back in time to find a pure form of the virus.

name: Brawlberry
summary: Battle the fruit guardians as you hack and slash through the fruit scape in this coop rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Gym Nights
summary: You are the caretaker of an old abandoned gym. Working as a watchman has long been an important part of your life. But what does this place hide? Why do you end up here again and again?

name: Prophan Escape
summary: In Prophan Escape you have to get five coper statues which are in random places around a labirynth to complete each level, it's that simple... Oh, yeah, there are also two antropomorphic weird cubes with realistic extremities that want to kill you, so you will have to avoid that weird guys.

name: Fighting for Singleship: I am Chased by a Bunch of Women But I Just Want to Play Video Games
summary: You relish indoor life, gaming, but now, a challenging twist: every woman adores you. Witness the story unfold. Conquer challenging waves of unhinged admirers, aiming to remain unmarried. Climb the leaderboard against your friends, proving your supremacy.

name: Inari
summary: A love simulation game set in a beautiful beach town. Make various stories with women of different charms.

name: Flambeau: Deluxxx Edition
summary: The mansion is filled to the brim with treaters wanting a sweet reward...it's your job to make sure they spend the rest of their afterlife enjoying the sweet nectar of Flambeau's body.

name: Kerker
summary: Kerker is a procedurally generated dungeon crawler FPS roguelike that challenges the player with its varying cast of enemies, exclusive weapons and different dungeon types. Fight your way to riches by slaying foes, obtaining/combining unique abilities and finding forgotten treasures.

name: 3Xtinction
summary: 3Xtinction is an Online Co-op Top Down Shooter with tactical and strategic elements. You and your friends will have to cooperate in order to complete missions.

name: Megaloot
summary: Minimalistic Rogue-Lite RPG with big focus on itemization where you craft your own playstyle inside the endless tower.

name: Minesweeper Collector 2
summary: Minesweeper with a story and detailed tutorials! Each level you pass is an item that changes the game world and advances you through the storyline. You will find collections, crafting and level chains, it will be fun!

name: Lilim Wants to Lv Up
summary: One night a beautiful girl suddenly appeared in my room, not only dressed in cool and sexy clothes, but also with horns and a tail.The self-proclaimed succubus Lilim came to the human world to become stronger, and my hoarded sexual desire was the perfect target for her.

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within
summary:
Journey through never-before-seen subterranean worlds filled with hidden wonders and lurking perils, down to the dark depths of the nerubian empire, where the malicious Harbinger of the Void is gathering arachnid forces to bring Azeroth to its knees.

Deep beneath the surface lies treasure vaults waiting to be discovered with Delves. Explore these world instances solo or with up to four friends, along with an NPC companion, to defeat bosses and gain epic end-game loot.

Expand the potential of your alternate characters with account-wide progression across your family of characters on your Battle.net account with Warbands. Share your Warband Bank access, War Within Renown, achievements, collections, and more.

Rise to new heights of power with new Hero Talent trees. Each class specialization has access to two choices of self-contained Hero Talent trees inspired by iconic Warcraft universe archetypes.

name: Road to Exotics!
summary: Arcade-inspired racing game, Cannon-Style! Race against up to 300 racers simultaneously, A unique perspective on arcade racing.

name: Supurr Cat Cafe: Sandwich Rush
summary: Stack towering sandwiches with the help of cute cat friends while building up your dream cat cafe. With plenty of hungry quirky customers around, you’ll need to upgrade your cafe, find new cats to help you and up your sandwich game to keep them happy!

name: Risk of Rain 2: EXXXXXXX-X
summary: An ancient threat awakens on Petrichor V. Master new Survivors, wield new items, and fight your way across uncharted regions. Ascend the levels of the Colossus in a race to confront The False Son. Defeat him and unlock the true power of his Soul!

name: Goblin and Coins II: The Lost Recipes
summary: A much easier stand-alone expansion to Goblin and Coins II. Use unlimited continues to run and double-jump through 25 handcrafted levels, and retrieve the recipes lost in the midnight raid from the original game.

name: The Neverwhere Tales : Book 1
summary: The Neverwhere Tales - Book 1 is a story-driven Adult Visual Novel. The story takes place in an urban fantasy setting and combines a modern world with fantasy elements. Book 1 is the story of Alexander Callister and how he learns about this hidden world called "Neverwhere."

name: Ammossum
summary: Dive into this action roguelite as a brave Possum, shooting down crowds of crazy beasts. Drink cactus booze, ride your train through the deserts, and feel the thrill of bloody shootouts! Whistling bullets, explosions, flying arrows, mines, fire, and acid — bring this chaos under control!

name: A Park Full of Cats
summary: Welcome to 'A Park Full of Cats,' a hidden object game that invites you to revel in the enchanting world of amusement parks! Experience the thrill and excitement of the rides and give those cats the fun they truly deserve!

name: CyberRush
summary: Dive into CyberRush, an adrenaline-fueled blend of Subway Surfer and NFS. Race through procedurally generated Cyberpunk levels, evading police, blasting obstacles, and competing for highscores. Experience the rush of neon-lit streets in this fast-paced infinite runner

name: Ale & Tale Tavern
summary: Get ready for a thrilling mix of genres: a cooperative, first-person, open-world fantasy tavern simulator, action, fishing, hunting, exploration, and completing fun and diverse quests. And, of course, cooking! Play with friends, feed and quench the thirst of the entire world!

name: A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride
summary: Prepare to be thrilled and chilled on "A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride",' the eerie downloadable content for 'A Park Full of Cats.' Embark on a ghostly adventure through six haunting scenarios! Are you brave enough to face the Haunted Ride?

name: Risk of Rain 2: Seekers of the Storm
summary: A new storm gathers over Petrichor V and with it comes an ancient threat. Master new survivors and wield new items as you fight your way across uncharted regions of Petrichor V. Ascend the Colossus, defeat The False Son, and unlock the true power of his Soul.

name: Last Dream Fishing Arcade
summary: Fish your way across lush Gaia in this retro 2D pixel-art fishing RPG. Enjoy a relaxing day or battle for your fishing life against monsters of the deep. With 12 selectable characters, varying difficulty, equipment options, and numerous surprises, you’ll be hooked on this buried treasure of a game!

name: The Christopher Redemption: I
summary: The Christopher redemption part I is a story-driven action thriller game that explores the intense and original story of Christopher and his sister.

name: Mechanical Lab
summary: Mechanical Lab is a 2D action game focused on the physical interaction of machines with the environment. Explore, build and experiment to survive in the city of robots long after the end of human civilization.

name: Wild Bastards
summary: The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy.

name: Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator
summary: Dedicate your life to saving others. As soon as you receive the emergency call, speed off to the site of the accident in your ambulance, sirens wailing. Apply first aid and transport the seriously injured to hospital. Every second counts!

name: Nocturnals
summary: A short, choose your own adventure game about two boys that find each other in a lonely, post-apocalyptic town.

name: NanoApostle
summary: NanoApostle is a dark sci-fi boss rush action game featuring intense reaction-based combat and the unique "Destruction Point" system. Play as Anita, a child augmented with lethal nanomachines, as she battles against twisted cybernetic experiments to escape a top-secret facility.

name: Castle of Lord Velimir
summary: Epic battle against encroaching darkness. It is a baby from Warcraft 3, Dark Souls and Super Mario bros. Don't ask, it was wild party.

name: LoveXLust
summary: Welcome to LoveXLust, where desire steals the spotlight! Immerse yourself in the ultimate VR adventure that's more than just a game, where you can unlock your deepest fantasies and experience love, lust, and endless excitement. Dive in, and let your desires come to life!

name: The Casting of Frank Stone
summary: The shadow of Frank Stone looms over Cedar Hills, a town forever altered by his violent past. As a group of young friends are about to discover, Stone’s blood-soaked legacy cuts deep, leaving scars across families, generations, and the very fabric of reality itself.

name: Visions of Mana
summary: For the first time in over 15 years, a brand-new entry in the mainline Mana series arrives! Embark on a new adventure with Val, the newly appointed soul guard, as he sets off on a journey across the world to accompany his friend on her pilgrimage to the Tree of Mana. Experience action-packed gameplay and explore a vibrant semi-open 3D field, encountering fearsome foes and unlikely allies along the way.

name: Mirage Feathers
summary: 「Maybe one day, I won't have to fight when I fly.」

name: Void Reaper
summary: Pilot your ship through the Void in 'Void Reaper'. Face diverse enemies, upgrade your ship, and battle bosses to reach the End Boss in this action-packed void odyssey. Can you destroy the Void and save the world?

name: Supermoves
summary: Supermoves is the ultimate parkour showdown where you and your friends run, jump and grind rails to glory! Go head to head in Bomb Tag, reach the finish line before the Rising Tide or race up to 40 players in Royale. Make your own games and levels with our powerful tools. Never stop running.

name: Guns & Draguns
summary: Experience the thrill of teamwork and competition in Guns And Draguns, a roguelite shooting game. Navigate through a perilous fantasy dungeon, defeat enemies together, and gather upgrades to defeat the final boss. But don't trust your friends too much; you all aim to be the best player!

name: Ground Zero Hero
summary: Wacky action-roguelite survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. The prologue covers the first full wasteland of the upcoming Ground Zero Hero.

name: Fears to Fathom: Woodbury Getaway
summary: In the fifth episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Sydney Harper, a 23-year-old working at a consulting firm plans a weekend getaway to a rental in Woodbury with her college friends. Little did they know what was about to unfold during their stay. Sydney survived as she made the right choices.

name: Yarimono
summary: The protagonist's life takes a turn after their partner Yarimon learns the ultra-invincible 'cheat Tackle' Constantly challenging various trainers to participate in the Yarimon tournament, the protagonist unexpectedly discovers the secrets of this world in the process.

name: Sanctity
summary: Sanctity is a Hack & Slash RPG with platformer elements where you travel between the Real and Virtual Worlds in fast-paced combat against swarms of enemies and boss fights inspired by MMO raid design.

name: Adventures in Lestoria
summary:
In this action dungeon-crawling RPG experience, you take on the role of a fighter: Explore and travel through the lands and surrounding countries of Lestoria in search of adventure!

Your quest begins in search of slimes in a nearby forest to restock on potion-making supplies, to soon discover that bandits have attacked the locals and have caused hysteria and chaos. Who would do such an awful thing, and can you put an end to their crimes?

name: 100 Cats New York
summary: Find 100 Cats hidden in New York! Can you find them all?

name: 100 Cats Berlin
summary: Find 100 Cats hidden in Berlin! Can you find them all?

name: World Without Reason
summary: A visual novel about a young adult living through several key moments in her life, as she tries to remember important details about her past.

name: Castles on Clouds
summary: A Roguelike Tower Defense game set on a user controlled procedurally generated island. Select unique cards and relics that enhance your towers abilities, crafting powerful builds to defend against the growing hordes of enemies.

name: WitchGhost
summary: A spooky adventure through a weird and wonderful land. Boost your powers and change the world as you help Ezme, the WitchGhost, collect her memories so she can remeber how to go home.

name: Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2
summary: A high-tempo shooter with simple controls. Enhance your character with cards and defend various targets as an employee of a private military company.

name: Devil's Hideout
summary: Devil's Hideout is a horror point and click adventure. Lauren learns from a mystic that her young sister is still alive, with cultists staging her death. Traveling to the hospital where her sister received care, Lauren plunges headfirst into a nightmare.

name: Mega Man X8 16-bit
summary:
A fan game made by AlyssonDaPaz. Bringing the original PS2 classic, MegaMan X8 back to it's 16-bit roots! Play as X and blast through a familiar yet fresh experience!

Mega Man X8 16-bit is a reimagining of the PS2 original with SNES styled graphics. The aim was to demake X8 in a similar feel to the first three Mega Man X games, while trying to actually finish a low-scope fangame. After two and a half years of development, version 1.0 was released in September 7th 2024, making the game fully playable from start to finish with X, but Zero and Axl are not featured in the game in any capacity.

In addition to the 16-bit graphics, the game differs from the original game by offering slightly different level designs at times, armor effects, and boss weapons.

name: Inn Tycoon
summary: Inn Tycoon is a relaxing and enjoyable game, offering you the opportunity to build, design, and manage your own inn.

name: Broadside Renegades
summary: Broadside Renegades combines auto-firing weapons with manual ship abilities in a rogue-like space pirate adventure. Choose your captain and upgrade your ship to steal the space kings booty. Warp ahead to stay alive, and mind your bearing.

name: The Void Chronicles: One's Desolation
summary: One day, Adele tells her daughter Liridona she's set up an arranged marriage with Prince Nathaniel. Everything seems to be going well between the two until Liridona hears something she shouldn't have from the prince. So, can she escape from Nathaniel's grasp or will she succumb to his persistence?

name: Orb Of The Watcher
summary: A tribute to the old adventure games of the nineties. Orb Of The Watcher is party based RPG where you explore the tunnels under a large city to find a magical artifact. Encountering friends, enemies and the odd pile of gold along the way.

name: Skyward Dream
summary: Dream, Leap, Explore! Immerse yourself in the Dreamworld of Skyward Dream, a first-person platforming Metroidvania-inspired adventure where reality and dreams blend. Leap through floating islands, unlock platforming abilities, and embark on an epic journey of self-discovery and dream-chasing!

name: Mannequin
summary:
Mannequin is an up to 2v3 asymmetrical VR multiplayer game. Two elite Agents ruthlessly hunt an opposing side of three shape-shifting aliens known as Mannequins. Aliens hide in plain sight, blending in by posing as frozen human statues. They ambush unsuspecting Agents, dashing forward and freezing them in place with a single touch.

Agents use bleeding edge tech to hunt Mannequins, scanning for targets with their EMF Readers and taking them down with an EMP gun. It’s their job to decipher friend from foe. If they make the wrong decision, they’re exposed.

The last team standing wins in this tense, frantic game of cat and mouse.

name: Leo the Firefighter Cat
summary: Meet Leo, the courageous firefighter cat, and help him on his exciting adventure as a junior recruit at the fire station! Take on missions that get trickier each time and climb the ranks with the guidance of Commander Nox. Don't worry, you're not alone!

name: Wizard Realm
summary: Wizard Realm is a dynamic game with rogue-like elements set in a fantastic 3D world. It enables players to develop various battle strategies using a multitude of magical skills to survive. It enriched with an advanced item system.

name: Mechanophagia
summary: Mechanophagia is a challenging bullet hell shooter with roguelite elements, set in a dark and gritty sci-fi world. Blast through waves of fleshy aberrations and defeat monstrous bosses. Can you outmaneuver the relentless enemy onslaught and save the robots from their inevitable extinction?

name: Tiny Battles
summary: Tiny Battles is a tactical action auto-battler where battles take place automatically in the arena.

name: Defenders
summary: You thought you landed alone. You were wrong. Now you must defend yourself against waves of enemies in order to survive. Vanquish thousands of foes, master your abilities, call in reinforcements, and survive in a quest to become a true Defender.

name: Gundam Breaker 4
summary: Create your own ultimate Gundam in the newest Gundam Breaker! With more customizable parts than ever before, you finally have the freedom to build your perfect Gunpla. Test it in battle using the brand new dual-weapon system and break parts off of your enemies and add them to your collection.

name: The Hokkaido Serial Murder Case: The Okhotsk Disappearance - Memories in Ice, Tearful Figurine
summary: The legendary Okhotsk Disappearance... is coming back.

name: Paper Plane Arena: A Medieval Fantasy
summary: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Paper Dash: Las Vegas
summary: Jump into "Paper Dash – Las Vegas", where your paper plane takes flight through the dazzling lights and vibrant nights of the city that never sleeps. Fly, glide, dash, scare away ghosts, and enjoy a peaceful journey, facing the ghosts of greed in exciting, relaxing, and jaw-dropping environments.

name: Terrorformer TD
summary: Terrorformer TD is a tower defense roguelite where the map erodes and grows as the game progresses -- but the player gets terraforming tools to shape it! Every round, fortify your defenses to survive against waves of enemies; then cash in for new towers, upgrades, and other rewards. Gain XP and level up to unlock new abilities and components after each run and try again to make it even further!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Gold Edition
summary: Pre-order the Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Gold Edition to receive the Macragge&rsquos Chosen DLC and play up to 3 days before release.About the early unlock:The early unlock is not guaranteed for Canada territory.Please make sure to check the shipping time when you place your order to ensure delivery before the release.Day one delivery is not guaranteed with standard shipping option.The Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Gold Edition includes the base game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, the Season Pass and an exclusive Steelbook.Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine. Unleash deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid swarms. Defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or co-op modes.

name: Maxwell's Puzzling Demon
summary: "Thermodynamic" puzzle where Maxwell's demon does work of sokoban. Deal those hot blocks with cold blocks so that the demon doesn't get burnt.

name: Astral Vangard
summary: Pilot your Vangard and battling against various enemies and bosses. Astral Vangard is a casual game with rogue-like elements in a futuristic world filled with Mecha. You can choose their own Vangard with different start weapon and characteristics, improving their abilities as they advance.

name: Backrooms: Last Room
summary: Experience the unknown world of utility rooms through a VHS camera, you will have to feel all the fear and anxiety of loneliness, plunging deeper and deeper into the world of utility rooms behind the scenes In search of that very, cherished, last room

name: Monster Jam Showdown
summary: To deliver the feeling and excitement of mastering 1,500 horsepower mechanical machines, Monster Jam Showdown will feature arcade gameplay endowed with comprehensive and customisable driving aids.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Episode Aigis
summary:
After unravelling the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fighting epic battles through Tartarus, and all the unforgettable events of Persona 3 Reload, the S.E.E.S. members find themselves trapped in a never-ending March 31st.

When an unfamiliar android, Metis, suddenly appears at the dorm along with the mysterious "Abyss of Time", the team works together to uncover the cause of this strange fate..

name: The Land of the Magnates
summary: An epic adventure of love, betrayal, and sacrifice awaits, rooted in Middle Eastern myths and legends! As Shahbaz, a disgraced prince, travel across magical realms, defeat minions of darkness with the magic of your sitar, and reclaim your throne, bringing the light back to the Land of the Sun.

name: The Dark Throng
summary: The Dark Horde is an exciting roguelike deckbuilder where the cost to play cards is TIME. Play your cards to summon a horde of minions and to cast powerful sorceries! Improve your defenses, acquire rare cards, level up, unlock new upgrades and then lay waste to each human settlements!

name: Mythic Trials
summary: Mythic Trials is a competitive Hack'n'Slash in which every player will create their unique skill build. It includes hundreds of Solo trials, Battle Royale PvP, Diablo-like item loots, daily World Bosses, rankings, draft tournaments, and dozens of different skills and is playable on mobile.

name: Orbs of Chaos
summary: Choose 3 orbs, and have access to 10 spell combinations at any time in this retro survivor rogue-lite. Destroy hordes of Lovecraftian horrors, and battle unique bosses that rise from the Chaos every 3 minutes. Only limit is your speed and memory.

name: Furry Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date Spooky Cat Girls 2?!
summary: Straight from the fright factory comes three SPOOKY games in one! Date demons from the center of the planet! Save a spooky theme park! Smash some faces in as giant Kaiju!

name: Putrika 1st.Cut: The Reason She Must Perish
summary: "Even though I knew this love was forbidden..." While the tragedy is being told, the girl's true love is revealed! Enjoy this crazy pure love drama with beautiful visuals and cute characters!

name: Psychomachia
summary: Dive into the psychological horror of Psychomachia, trapped in a terrifying loop at the heart of the madness-infested dormitories. Explore the twisted depths of the human mind, confronted by terrifying manifestations of insanity.

name: Politica: Nothing Ideological. It's Just Business
summary: Politica is a mini-game political simulator. Assuming the role of a lobbyist in republican Italy, players will have to accumulate as much money and power as possible through lobbying strategies, political relations and intrigue.

name: Chicago Project
summary: The Chicago Project is a linear, plot-driven RPG puzzle game that blends visual novel and DND elements. The player takes on the role of an engineer, burdened with social responsibility and grief over the loss of a mentor, and ultimately unravels the conspiracy of the powers that be.

name: Dino Cats
summary: 🦕 Hidden Dino Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this dinosaur park! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️‍♂️

name: Hidden Dino Cats: Bonus Level
summary: Hidden Dino Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: DeliSpace
summary: Deliver packages... in space! Test your agility by navigating through different galaxies carrying diverse packages and upgrade your ship. Will you become the best courier in the universe?

name: Put it here
summary: "Put it Here" is a casual puzzle gameplay that includes item storage, arrangement,Here players need to place scattered items according to certain rules. A variety of interesting and healing levels are waiting for you to unlock!

name: Descensus
summary: Descensus is a souls-like action-RPG with challenging combat set in post-catastrophe diesel punk world. The player's goal is to reach the heart of the mysterious Rift of the Fallen Star. It is necessary to stop the expansion and spread of the anomaly before it absorbs the whole world.

name: Sugar Tanks Arena
summary: SugarTanks-Arena is an intense, fast-paced, and super-sweet tank arena shooter.Defeat all enemy tanks while dodging their bouncing bullets.Level by level they will get faster, smarter and deadlier.

name: Squigley
summary: Traverse and experience a massive, cohesive 2D world as Squigley. Use your wits, resources and unique movement mechanics in order to explore this dark digital world.

name: Rockhopper
summary: Rockhopper is a single player asteroid mining rougelike featuring procedurally generated asteroids, robust upgrade paths and dark exploration with enemies and ancient secrets to uncover.

name: Necroking
summary: Necroking is a turn-based tactics roguelite with pixel art graphics. You play as a Master of Necromancy. Build your sculls deck, rise skeletons and other scum to defeat settlements desecrated by life.

name: Gelatin Is Hungry
summary: A hungry slime from Outer Space wreaks havoc throughout the Universe! Control Gelatin and plow through different levels and platforms, eat everything you can and avoid obstacles. The more you eat, the more you’ll grow. How far will your hunger take you?

name: Stevedore 2024
summary: It's intermodal mayhem! Shift that freight in a hurry without incurring disaster in this physics simulation action RPG. Learn to drive some of the oddest vehicles on the planet as you load huge ocean-crossing ships. And where is that strangely elusive operations manager, the Stevedore?

name: Fumble Fiesta
summary: Fumble Fiesta is a whimsical multiplayer party game designed for up to 4 players. Navigate through a series of colorful obstacle courses, filled with wacky challenges and unexpected twists. Compete against friends or random opponents as you race, jump, and tumble your way to victory.

name: Neon Rumble
summary: In Neon Rumble, players face off in electrifying puzzle-match arenas where skill, strategy, and experience ultimately lead to victory. Clear your board with lighting speed, destroy junk blocks, unleash combo attacks, and activate your Neonite's power to clinch the win.

name: DeathSprint 66
summary: DEATHSPRINT 66 redefines hardcore arcade racing, fusing high-speed on-foot racing with a dystopian setting and deadly obstacles. Unleash your velocity, push limits, and claim glory like never before.

name: Forklift Simulator
summary: Start your career in logistics today in Forklift Simulator! Take on a variety of different missions, a selection of vehicles and an extensive career mode in which you can put your skills to the test. Are you ready for the challenges ahead?

name: Tribute
summary: In "Tribute," a fast-paced roguelike, escape prison and save your son by harvesting souls for power, unlocking abilities, and facing numerous foes. Discover 15 endings shaped by your choices, with extensive upgrades and classes enhancing your journey.

name: Defense of the Earth
summary: Gather a task force of the best fighters earth has to offer and research technology to defend against the invaders out of space. You have to lead your squad through various grid- and turn-based battles. Between missions, you plan your next moves, manage your crew's abilities and relationships.

name: Reshape
summary: You're the architect of your world. Design without limits, create without boundaries. Your world, your way, unleash your creativity.

name: Warcat Parade
summary: Catboy in a bullet hell! Nyan, nyan, pew pew pew!

name: Dungeon Divers
summary: Dungeon Divers is a dungeon-themed puzzle game about clearing derelict dungeons. As the newest employee of Dungeon Divers Inc., you must advance through multiple procedural generated levels, use your wits, and tools you acquire along the way to get to the core to defuse it and bring home the cash.

name: Earthling of Gaia
summary: Save your goddess Gaia from all incoming enemies by manipulating the earth around you!

name: Chat Wars!
summary: Chat Wars! is a real time strategy game playable only for a streamer with at least 30~40 viewers. Gather gold and upgrade chat viewer's Unit and spell for streamer! Collaborate with chat and streamers to win!

name: Legacy of Epstein: Foul Dreamer
summary: Following the events of his "Bad Omen", Juglio arrives in the fallen city of Gettysburg to search for his friend Lenny.

name: Liminality
summary: Liminality is a single-player exploration game focused on liminal spaces, but mainly the poolrooms. Dive into the eerie but relaxing lukewarm water of the poolrooms. Navigate through the liminal spaces, where reality blurs, and uncover the secrets that lie beneath the surface

name: Mission: Rift Seeker
summary: Mission: Rift seeker is a colony simulation game about building and managing your base on an unknown planet and exploring the surrounding void rifts that are full of horrific and mysterious entities that you are tasked to capture before they to eat the brave and fluffy seekers that you command.

name: Monkey Forward
summary: Race through cherry tree seasons as a speedy monkey collecting honey and dodging obstacles in this thrilling endless run game but with advanced gameplay.

name: Cozy Designer
summary: Position furniture and objects however you prefer and create 60 incredibly cozy environments. With no right or wrong, the only limit is your imagination! Create your own gallery and share your designs with the whole world.

name: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
summary: Navigate office intrigue in Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies! Complete tasks, uncover the carrier of illegal leads, and outsmart coworkers in this strategic multiplayer game set in an early 2000s office.

name: Brave Quest
summary: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Hollow Floor
summary: Hollow Floor is an exploration-based single-sitting Metroidvania inspired by VVVVVV and REDDER. Hollow Floor is a relaxed game that is full of secrets and hard challenges that can be tackled at any moment in the game or completely ignored.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Gold Edition
summary:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Gold Edition includes the base game, the season pass, and 3 days early access.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Limited Edition
summary:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Limited Edition includes the base game and the Rogue Infiltrator Character Pack.

name: Pharmacy Simulator
summary: Experience a realistic pharmacy management experience with Pharmacy Simulator. Set up your shop, decorate it as you wish, and purchase over a hundred types of medications. Pharmacy Simulator offers you an incredibly realistic pharmacy experience. Prove your skills in a challenging economic system.

name: Deathtrip
summary: Ayla's Deathtrip is a daring, stylish, high-octane FPS catered to the speedfreaks, mid-2000s weirdcore enthusiasts, hypercore fanatics and adrenaline junkies. Rack up style points as you strafe and bunnyhop through a demonic near-death experience.

name: The Adventures of Emoji 4: Fly High Mouse - Remastered
summary: Step into The Adventures of Emoji 4 Remastered, where you immerse yourself in this mouse cartoon world playing a shoot em up side-scroller. Follow dynamic rules and use special weapons to defeat enemies for each level. Stay focused on the prize or you might find your game completely cut off.

name: PromptCrafter
summary: The game is a command-line based crafting game with procedurally generated crafting trees. The crafting can be automated using programming-like automation.

name: Nimbusfall
summary: Dive into a new and thrilling boss rush-style video game where revenge is the only motivation. Step into the shoes of the last survivor of a race decimated by The Moon, now seeking to settle the score with the culprit of its extinction. But what secrets does The Moon hold?

name: Nolgorb's Ordeal
summary: A challenging 3D platformer with little room for error. Escape a dungeon by jumping to the top, and trade your collectables to aid in your ordeal.

name: Pushing It! With Sisyphus
