summary: A game about a very happy guy and his boulder.

name: Stellaris: Cosmic Storms
summary: A new phenomenon has been observed around the Galaxy - storms are sweeping through system. Prepare your Empire and brace to face this new upcoming threat, and leverage possibilities that open when your opponents are weakened by it.

name: DeSoloFender
summary: a tower defense game in a 3D environment. Unique interface design and damage system which significantly increases the strategy factor. With a choice of 4 different weapons and a lot of improvement options, this game is perfect for putting your strategic skills to the test.

name: Galandrix
summary: Galandrix is an arcade game played from a top-down view and features both fast-paced action and real time strategic choices. Select your ship and blast off into the unknown against countless hordes of enemies.

name: Star Fetchers: Escape from Pork Belly
summary: A action filled rouglite boxing game where you'll punch and claw yourself out of the fighting ring "Pork Belly", an illegal gladiator arena hidden in the outskirt of the Gray Zone.

name: Yars Rising
summary:
From the renowned development studio WayForward Technologies, Inc. (Shantae, River City Girls, Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp) comes Yars Rising, a 2D action adventure exploration of one of Atari’s richest, and best known classic titles.

In WayForward’s experienced hands, the Yars franchise becomes an expansive mystery solved through 2D platforming action. Take control of the young hacker Emi Kimura, who is hired by a mysterious patron to infiltrate the shadowy QoTech corporation. Run, jump, sneak, and hack your way through challenges as you slowly unravel a complex secret shrouded in intrigue.

name: Fallen
summary: Description:This game is a psychic action game. Escape from the maze-like research facility by manipulating telekinesis, levitation, and teleportation.

name: Urayama
summary: Urayama is a psychological J-horror game featuring students on summer vacation.

name: Seductress
summary: Create the desired character and send her to explore and fight with aroused humans and monsters. Become the heroine and seduce as many creatures as possible, she will be punished after defeated and enjoy the interactions with them.

name: Global Elite
summary: Save the Earth from countless swarms of giant insects as a valiant member of the GLOBAL ELITE! Auto-battle your way to victory with a ragtag crew of survivors! Use every weapon at your disposal to crush those bugs and save humanity! Join the fight and become a member of the GLOBAL ELITE!

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Special Edition
summary:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Special Edition includes the base game and the Sabacc Shark Character Pack.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Ultimate Edition includes the base game, the season pass, the Rogue Infiltrator bundle, the Sabacc Shark bundle, a digital art book, and 3 days early access.

name: The Jackbox Naughty Pack
summary: Bring the heat with a threesome of fun in Jackbox Naughty Pack. Find out who’s the best liar in Fakin’ It All Night Long, illustrate spicy prompts in Dirty Drawful, and answer questions like “How does this avocado get aroused?” in Let Me Finish.

name: Sonic Rumble
summary: On your mark, get set...PLAY! Get ready to race in the Sonic Rumble! Jump into a speedy, 32-person mobile royale set in a cheery toy world created by Dr. Eggman. Play as some of your favorite characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog universe complete with customization to create your perfect avatar as you dive into action-packed gameplay.

name: Celestia: Chain of Fate
summary: A romance-fantasy visual novel that delivers a captivating player driven narrative. Enrol at Celestia Academy and uncover your heritage. Delve into a fantastical realm and unearth your magical potential as a hybrid. Forge new friendships and build affections based on your love interests.

name: Akimbot
summary: In the action-adventure platformer, Akimbot, blast your way through armies of robots, pilot spaceships and forge your own path to save the universe from impending doom! Set in a sci-fi world where only robots exist, travel the galaxy and experience non-stop robot mayhem and explosive action!

name: Star Chef Simulator
summary:
Welcome to Star Chef Simulator, where your dream of running your own restaurant is about to become a reality! Immerse yourself in the exciting world of culinary entrepreneurship as you build and manage your restaurant from the ground up. Unleash your inner chef and dive in the art of cooking with more than 10 delicious dishes from around the world. Cook with a variety of different ingredients, techniques and recipes to create culinary masterpieces that will delight your customers. Use various kitchen appliances such as the deep fryer, oven, stove or mixer and create unique dishes!

Hire, train, and manage your employees to keep your restaurant running smoothly. Build a strong team to handle the hustle and bustle of a busy kitchen. Customize your restaurant, from the walls to the floors, from the decor to the equipment. Create a unique dining experience and watch customers flock to your establishment.
Keep an eye on your finances as you make decisions to grow your business. Manage employee costs and invest in upgrades to attract more customers and increase profits. Provide top-notch service to your guests to earn rave reviews. Listen to feedback and strive to deliver a memorable dining experience that keeps guests coming back for more.

Are you ready to take the helm of your own restaurant and become the ultimate culinary star chef? The world of gastronomy awaits you!

name: Dead by Daylight: Castlevania Chapter
summary: So comes the very night incarnate, accursed and ravenous, for darkness is Dracula’s domain. With the ability to transform into the vile denizens of the woods and conjure unnatural flames, all mortals shall succumb to The Dark Lord’s vengeance.

name: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawatareshi Toki
summary: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawataresi Toki is a Japanese RPG, released by Eushry on PC in 2024.

name: Death in Unison
summary: Survive the world's deadliest psychopaths. Experience a unique 2-player co-op experience that puts your teamwork and communication to the test. Complete your duties alone or with a partner in a prison like no other.

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - Horny Madness
summary: In the wastelands of Pentarull there is a town "El Drakio", under the control of Sevilla. Strange things are happening - people are horny! What is going on in the town, and is Sevilla involved? The hero will set out to investigate the strange phenomena of the HORNY MADNESS!

name: Hentai Violet
summary: Violet is a nasty girl Will you be able to handle her?

name: Utopia Must Fall
summary: Defend humanity's last metropolis from mysterious alien machinations in this base-defending arcade shooter. Featuring rapid progression, randomly generated attack patterns and laser-sharp retro aesthetics.

name: Deepest World
summary: DeepestWorld is a coding sandbox MMORPG where you can automate your character with JavaScript. Explore an endless open world. Hunt rare monsters and bosses. Craft deep builds and items. Acquire programming skills. Grind 24/7.

name: Pineford: Part I
summary: Investigate the murder of Evie Roots. Save the town from disaster. Learn the history of the Great Houses. Immerse yourself in the centuries-old history of Pineford.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
summary:
Developed by Treyarch and Raven, Black Ops 6 is a spy action thriller set in the early 90s, a period of transition and upheaval in global politics, characterized by the end of the Cold War and the rise of the United States as a single superpower. With a mind-bending narrative, and unbound by the rules of engagement, this is signature Black Ops.

The Black Ops 6 Campaign provides dynamic moment-to-moment gameplay that includes a variety of play spaces with blockbuster set pieces and action-packed moments, high-stakes heists, and cloak-and-dagger spy activity.

In a best-in-class Multiplayer experience, players will test their skills across 16 new maps at launch, including 12 core 6v6 maps and 4 Strike maps that can be played 2v2 or 6v6.

Black Ops 6 also marks the epic return of Round-Based Zombies, the fan-favorite mode where players will take down hordes of the undead in two brand-new maps at launch. Post-launch, players can look forward to even more exciting maps and groundbreaking experiences dropping into both Multiplayer and Zombies.

name: Puffin Planes
summary: A casual airline management game set on a globe. Supports singleplayer and Steam co-op.

name: OneKind
summary: Three bad friends on a farm... Fast or slow, brave or master of hiding, everyone is the enemy... However, the only owner of the farm... Remember, the most reliable defence is hiding... This game invites you into an exciting world, whether you are a hunt, a huntsman or a spy!

name: Team of Titans
summary: The evil Mirror Clan holds dominion over the region of Latos. Everyone has lost all hope, except for one. An unlikely hero must build a Team of Titans and bring an end to the reign of tyranny.

name: Stardrop
summary: Gumdrop was peacefully sleeping in their asteroid when a mysterious force smashed it to pieces above the orbit of a nearby planet. Venture through a whimsical world to collect all the lost star droplets, slivers, and shards in this 3D platformer collectathon.

name: Rocket Panda
summary: Enter a thrilling journey to save Biscuit Land from the clutches of the wicked Biscuit Head! Join Rocket Panda and his loyal band of Badgers as they take flight to rescue their kidnapped comrades and reclaim their homeland.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Ultra Edition
summary: Pre-order the Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Ultra Edition to receive the Macragge’s Chosen DLC and play up to 4 days before release.The Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Ultra Edition includes the base game, the Ultramarines Champion DLC and the Season Pass.Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine and defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or multiplayer modes.

name: The Orange
summary: In a forgotten universe lies a legendary orange: the Orange of Infinity. Press it to shape existence itself and confront the darkness.

name: Sorelle
summary: Welcome to the magical world of Sorelle: a whimsical 3D puzzle-platformer that immerses you in the magical seaside town of Isola Chiara. Play as sisters Alessandra, Bella, and Capri as you explore the magic of sisterhood in a puzzle-solving adventure to restore magic and save the summer festival.

name: Seal the Rift
summary: Discover an endlessly replayable roguelike deckbuilder. Craft a unique deck to overcome the challenges ahead. Collect powerful relics, harness potent magic and skillfully make use of the "Boost" mechanic to Seal the Rift!

name: Captive: You Are My Idol
summary: A young adult, Aylen, is an online personality who loves horror games. As she was shooting the intro for her next Let's Play, her biggest fan kidnaps her. There are only two means for escape: examine the area and begin plotting, or try your charisma and get an edge over him.

name: Clutch-Master
summary: This is a 2D top-down shooter with a flair of parody. You need to clutch 16 rounds in a row to win the map. There are 10 different maps in the base game.

name: Cosmic Cowboy
summary: Cosmic Cowboy is a tactic turn-based RPG inspired by the original Fallout, Borderlands and XCOM, where the player must navigate the distant planet of Armstrong and its dangerous inhabitants in this character-driven Space Western narrative.

name: Dj 8 Beats: Infinite
summary: ... One Dj ... ... eight Levels ... ... some beats ...

name: Echo in Capistrano
summary: Echo in Capistrano is an atmospheric horror game with a simple goal - rescue the survivors, escape, and most importantly survive. Use your unique echo ability to find a path through the dizzying cave system of Capistrano, but be careful, there are things that lie in wait and they are hungry...

name: Industring
summary: A minimalistic urban planning puzzle. Manage resources and building locations. Accumulate knowledge points and discover the secrets of the destroyed planet

name: Equiverse
summary: Experience the ultimate ecosystem simulator! Equiverse is a cozy simulation game where you care for different species of animals, earn income by keeping them happy, unlock helpful companions, and defend against invading monsters. Can you keep your ecosystem thriving?

name: Astro Bot
summary: Buckle up for some epic PlayStation camaraderie, join forces with your favourite PlayStation icons and show the universe that small is mighty in this fresh new Astro adventure, exclusive to PS5 consoles!

name: World Heritage VR: Swedish Farmhouse
summary: Virtual World Heritage: Fågelsjö is a VR rendition of the Fågelsjö farmsteads from the 1700s, located in the Hälsningland area of Sweden.

name: Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Detective Conan
summary:
A licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the popular manga Detective Conan.
This model of Nano is the first one to have colors and rechargable batteries.

name: Hitman 3 VR: Reloaded
summary:
In HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded Agent 47 returns as the world’s top assassin for the most important contracts of his entire career.
Rebuilt from the ground up for VR, HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded marks a significant milestone in the HITMAN series, leveraging the power of Meta Quest 3 to deliver an unparalleled, untethered, and unrivalled VR experience.

name: Containment Initiative 2
summary: Containment Initiative 2 is a local asymmetric co-op VR shooter which can be played by two people on the same PC. Kill zombies alone in VR or have a friend cover you by using the mouse and keyboard. Explore and scavenge to unlock new gear and weapons to help you survive the infected horde!

name: Pirate's Money
summary: Welcome to Pirate's Money, the ultimate adventure on the seven seas, where strategy, courage and cunning determine who will reign over the treacherous waters of Pirate's Island! Your legend begins now. Raise the sails, load the cannons and win BIG in Pirate's Money.

name: Kira Kano
summary: Kira Kano is an upcoming visual novel developed by AZARASHI SOFTWARE in collaboration with Lump of Sugar to commemorate the latter's 10th anniversary that tells the story of Yuzuru, an ordinary student at first glance but he's actually famous on the Internet. His secret identity leaks to a classmate and she... asks to make her his apprentice.

name: How We Die
summary: Pack your bag with good tools, modify your character's dice, and reach the end of the story.

name: Tragala
summary: Tragala is a graphic adventure game in which you will play Kurt, a restless young man who tries to escape from the system house ruled by the junjuma, a control and blame machine that is part of a systematic and terrible monster known as Tragala.

name: Ninja 1987
summary: Ninja 1987 is a dive back into the past with the most authentic 8-bit side-scrolling action-platformer. Use shinobi skills to thwart a nefarious threat and rediscover all the adrenaline of timeless classics!

name: My Bath Tub Companion
summary: My Bath Tub Companion is a free experience, to induce a calm & peaceful (and mildly horny) feeling. You'll feel satisfied sitting back, feel yourself relax as you watch her relax. Relaxation is the key to a blissful bath tub experience. Calm music & a beautiful girl to look at.

name: Glusiverse
summary: Help GlusiGlusi in this adventure to find the remedy to his master illness.

name: Cain x Nica
summary: ‘Cain × Nica’ is a visual novel about a pointless struggle doomed to failure from the start. But... doesn't that just make it more beautiful? The game features animated CGs and character sprites, a huge number of locations and soundtracks. Game length: 10-12 hours.

name: Adrift
summary: Casual Single Player Space Fishing Game

name: Fields of Asphodel
summary: Fields of Asphodel is a 1.3 million-word interactive novel by JJ Laurier. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Unstoppable: Breakout
summary: Unstoppable: Breakout is an immersive horror adventure where strategy, resource management, and courage are necessary if you want to survive. Escape the tower … if you can.

name: Colorma
summary: Think you've mastered the world of color? Think again! Colorma, an innovative puzzle game, challenges your perception and creativity like never before. Place color tiles, create stunning gradients and conquer intricate challenges on grids that bend and twist like a crossword puzzle. Decoys, clones and keyless levels will test your spatial reasoning and unlock your inner color wizard.

name: Sumerian Six
summary: Lead an unlikely team of commando scientists behind enemy lines to fight Nazis, uncover arcane mysteries, and wield experimental technology to turn the tide of WWII in this real-time tactical stealth adventure.

name: I Am Your Beast
summary: I Am Your Beast is a shortform covert revenge thriller FPS about getting hunted across the North American wilderness by the military-industrial complex--and turning the tables.

name: Monopoly
summary: Monopoly is back with a fresh look and an improved game experience. Buy, sell, trade properties, and grow your empire in this faithful adaptation of the game we all grew up with! Dive into the centre of the board to explore a gorgeous fully animated 3D city.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York
summary: Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York is a narrative game set in the World of Darkness Universe. Play as one of the members of the Vampire Clans in a shifting political landscape between the Camarilla and the Anarchs while trying your best to survive.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite & Beyond
summary: A mod conversion of MVC:I that overhauls the functionality, art, and playstyle of general characters in the game, including the addition of a new 4-player, 2v2 mode where all 4 characters actively fight on-screen at the same time.

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• GUNDAM BREAKER 4
• Deluxe Edition Bonus (Gunpla Parts Early Unlock - 15 Base Kits)
• Season Pass
- 5 Story Missions
- Season Pass Bonus (set of parts to recreate the Gunbarrel Strike Gundam - Gundam Breaker Ver.)

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• GUNDAM BREAKER 4
• Deluxe Edition Bonus (Gunpla Parts Early Unlock - 15 Base Kits)
• Season Pass
- 5 Story Missions
- Season Pass Bonus (set of parts to recreate the Gunbarrel Strike Gundam - Gundam Breaker Ver.)
• Diorama Pack Set
- 4 Diorama Packs
- Diorama Pack Set Bonus (Gundam Breaker Series easel and poster set to display in Diorama Mode)

name: The Hardest Game in the Universe: DLC 3
summary: The DLC 3 for "The Hardest Game in the Universe" has arrived, bringing an extra dose of difficulty and challenging new enemies. Get ready to tackle complex environments, new traps, and a variety of cunning adversaries.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics
summary:
Dive into an action-packed lineup consisting of seven unique titles, including heavy hitters like X-MEN VS. STREET FIGHTER, and MARVEL vs. CAPCOM 2 New Age of Heroes. The collection also includes the rare beat 'em up game, THE PUNISHER.

Whether you're new to the series or a nostalgic arcade veteran, players of all skill levels can enjoy these timeless classics together through local and online play!

name: Ace Attorney Investigations Collection
summary: EUREKA! Miles Edgeworth moves beyond the courtroom and straight to the crime scene in Ace Attorney Investigations Collection with revamped graphics, new language options, bonus features, and more! Featuring two remastered titles - Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth and the Western debut of Ace Attorney Investigations 2: Prosecutor's Gambit - it's a perfect package.

name: Evil Corporation
summary: Evil Corporation is a co-op horror exploration game. Travel through eerie levels, while avoiding creatures and other dangers, trying to get even with the Corporation.

name: Biblios: Tome of Darkness
summary: Biblios: Tome of Darkness is a fast paced first person shooter inspired by the biggest hits of the 1990s and Boomer Shooter revival. Fight a host of unique and challenging enemies, wield a powerful arsenal of weapons, and search high and low for secrets and lore notes to reveal the mysterious motives of the evil Acolytes of Seth.

name: Next of Kin
summary: Next of Kin is an emotional story about Thomas's endeavors to find his lost wife, Martha. Solve puzzles, find clues, and uncover the truth of Martha's disappearance.

name: Gimmick! 2
summary: Embark on a sparkling journey in this long-awaited sequel to SUNSOFT’s legendary 8-bit platformer Gimmick! Solve puzzles, trick enemies, and explore a physics-based playground. Yumetaro is back!

name: Shadow Trick
summary: Turn into a shadow and clear all the levels. Shadow Trick is a cute platformer game starring a wizard able to switch between the real world and the shadow realm. Keep an eye on your shadow and don't let your eyes trick you!

name: Starwave
summary: STARWAVE launches you into a cosmic voyage of high-energy music and exhilarating freeform movement. Feel the rhythm of the universe as you soar through distant galaxies bringing color and light to the night sky.

name: By Grit Alone
summary:
Stranded. Tormented. Alone.
By Grit Alone is an action horror shooter combining frantic combat, bosses and challenges with a harrowing sci-fi anthology story.

You’re marooned in a bizarre unknown dimension of space, filled with ancient derelicts and ravenous aliens. Uncover the mysteries of the dead as you move ship to ship, slaughtering your way through hordes of brain starved horrors.

Fight. Discover. Survive.
Experience twisted stories from our incredible writers, with credits including Dead Space, Resident Evil and Dr Who. There's no loading screens, no inventory and unlimited ammo; you’ll need skill and focus to rip through the ferocious swarms and get out of this corrupted hellhole in one piece.

By Grit Alone, you will survive.

name: Ace Attorney Investigations 2: Prosecutor's Gambit
summary: Prosecutor's Gambit is the second of Edgeworth's solo outings. Featuring new characters and the new "Mind Chess" gameplay mechanic, this title also expands on the crime scene re-creation gameplay mechanic introduced in the first entry. With his right to investigate crimes stripped from him, Edgeworth is left wondering if he should continue to pursue the truth as a prosecutor or as a defense attorney. Just what will his ultimate answer be...?

name: Noroi E: Darkness
summary:
In "Noroi E: Darkness", you immerse yourself in the shoes of Detective Juárez, a private detective who has been investigating paranormal cases since he was fired from the police department. One night, you receive a desperate call from a mother worried about the disappearance of her son, Oscar García, in a small, bleak town in northern Mexico called Santa Anna.

Arriving at the scene, you find a gloomy environment, decrepit buildings and an atmosphere full of mystery. Your mission is to discover what happened to Oscar and solve the dark secret behind his disappearance.

name: Vyanka's Memories
summary: Vyanka Silverlight is a monster hunter who was called to her native village to protect itfrom a great evil that is destroying his land. Her grandfather was attacked by a vampire and lost his memory. Take on the role of this intrepid huntress and defeat enemies trying to destroy your home while recovering the memory of your grandfather.

name: NBA 2K25
summary: Stack wins, raise banners, and make history in NBA 2K25. Command every court with authenticity and realism Powered by ProPLAY, giving you ultimate control over how you play in NBA 2K25. Define your legacy in MyCAREER, MyTEAM, MyNBA, and The W.

name: Emio: The Smiling Man - Famicom Detective Club
summary:
Explore an interactive drama full of interesting characters

Continue the adventures of the Utsugi Detective Agency with the return of familiar characters—including the returning protagonist from previous games, and Ayumi Tachibana, who is now playable in certain sections of the game for the first time in the series!

Playing as the investigative duo, you’ll need to learn a lot about the personalities and backstories of the other characters if you want to discover the truth. Who is harmless, and who is keeping important secrets? Ask questions, reference your notes, and make connections—you’ll have to order your thoughts and examine your leads carefully to draw the right conclusions.

name: Son and Bone
summary: Son and Bone is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you take on the role of Sam Judge, a Sheriff, that after tracking down a notorious bandit who attacked a farm and kidnapped a local, has found himself on an alien world overrun by prehistoric creatures and dinosaurs.

name: Monster Jam Showdown: Big Air Edition
summary: Feel the adrenaline rush with Monster Jam Showdown - Big Air Edition! Pre-order now and, in addition to the full game, you'll get: Season Pass, the two DLCs Law & Disorder and The Odd Couple and 3 days of early access!

name: Slime Musume ha Ningen to Tomodachi ni Naritai you da
200 Hidden House Cats
summary: Uh-oh! 200 mischievous house cats are causing mayhem in homes everywhere! Embark on a purr-suit to find them all!

summary: This bundle includes the base game Mining Mechs and its Magnetic Mystery add-on!

name: This Company of Mine
summary: In the urban workplace, you will hold great power and it's time to decide the fate of others. Eliminate those guys you don't like and hire those you like. This is a company that belongs to you!

name: Rangarok End Girls

Each color you match powers up a specific squad member, allowing them to unleash devastating attacks on the undead.

All of them share the common trait of being gamers, so you, who love games, will have lively conversations with them.

Can John find a way to return to his human form, or will this unexpected adventure change them forever?

And now, it's time to search, everywhere, to understand who you were. And most importantly, what's left to do here.

In this non-VR port, DiggerSim is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

In this game, you'll be tasked with completing a variety of excavation jobs, from digging foundations to clearing land. You'll have to carefully manoeuvre your excavator through tight spaces and navigate around obstacles to complete the level.

As you progress through the game, you'll have challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

HANGAR 8 is a psychological horror set within the unsettling confines of a derelict space station. Brave the looping corridors, spot all ?? anomalies, collect key items, and escape the nightmare!

Blending anomaly spotting mechanics from games such as "The Exit 8" and "I'm on Observation Duty", with the liminal-space psychological horror of "The Backrooms", HANGAR 8 challenges both your memory and your sanity.

summary: Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 3 is the third book of the Blades of Light and Shadow series. It succeeds its first two books, Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 1 and Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 2.

name: Nobk Overlay
summary: Welcome to NOBK Overlay, the ultimate fruit-clicking adventure! Your task is simple: click on delicious, vibrant fruits to generate even more fruits. The more you click, the more your orchard grows, and the juicier your rewards become!

name: Forza Motorsport: 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Jordan Luka 3
Forza Horizon 5: 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Jordan Luka 3
Stellarcraft
summary: Stellarcraft is a captivating sci-fi tower defense game that delves deep into the vast expanses of the universe, offering players the opportunity to explore planets, gather resources, and defend against numerous threats.

name: Faaast Penguin
summary: "Fast Penguin" is an action-packed racing game where up to 40 penguins compete in a chaotic race to the finish. Players can unleash attacks, ride on ultimate rides, use shortcuts, and outpace rivals to reach the finish line first.

name: Micro Wars
summary: Micro Wars is a fast-paced real time strategy game that throws you into the action in short, intense online battles featuring up to 8 players. Tailor your strategy with a variety of commanders and units, build your base, mine some minerals, and micro your way to victory. Hone your skills with the campaign and custom maps, and demonstrate your prowess to climb the ranks!

name: Badminton Time
summary: Get ready to move your arms to hit the badminton shuttlecock and become the new champion!

name: Find Room 96 + Exit Station 7 + The Eerie Surroundings + HighScore Anomaly Shop + HighScore Anomaly Underground
Fruit Attack!!
summary: Merge the funny fruits and get the giant cherry!

name: Uboat Attack
summary: Rise through the ranks and become a legendary commander!

name: Bubble Blaster DX
summary: Pop, Bounce, and Conquer the Leaderboards in the Ultimate Bubble Blaster!

name: Battle Wizard Attack
summary: Unleash your inner spell caster in this action-packed, retro-style RPG! Choose from eight powerful magic disciplines and face monstrous hordes across sprawling maps packed with destructible chaos.

name: Words Guesser
summary:
Words Guesser is an engaging word puzzle game that brings the thrill of collaborative gameplay directly to your Twitch stream. In this game, you and your viewers work together to uncover hidden words from a jumbled board of letters displayed on your screen. With each round, you'll need to find as many words as possible, relying on your community’s quick thinking and sharp eyes.

Each level presents a unique board of scrambled letters, challenging you to discover a majority of the hidden words to advance. The game progressively increases in difficulty by introducing trick letters and mystery letters that only reveal themselves after a certain time or when a player successfully guesses them.

name: Boosted Survivors
summary:
Boosted Survivors is a sandbox rogue-like, filled to the brim with exciting secrets. Fight dangerous waves of enemies, find legendary upgrades, and boost your hero along the way.

Boosting lets you increase or decrease any value of your hero, weapons and abilities, giving you complete freedom to reinterpret the game in new and exciting ways. Every run is completely unique and limited only by your creativity.

name: Cactiverse
summary: The world of Cactiverse, where gardening meets dragon-fueled fun! Grow your cacti, unleash fireballs, and join a vibrant community on Discord. With weekly tournaments and hilarious gameplay, Cactiverse is your next obsession. Fun, challenging, and social—what more could you ask for?

name: El Camino Del Zorro
summary: El Camino del Zorro or The Fox's Path in English is a platform game created for a school project. It's about our character, Foxy, who wants to return home. Along the way, he encounters some difficulties.

name: 10-Second Ghost
summary: A creative indie game from GameJam. Your past self will turn into a ghost and help your current self solve the puzzle together.

name: What Happened: Through Worlds
summary: Delve into a digital odyssey of discovery and unravel the mystery!

name: Animal Water Pang!
summary: Combine cute animal plushies to earn points and create larger plushies! Try not to let the plushies spill out of the claw machine on your quest for a high score.

name: Island Survival: Craft, Build, Grow
summary: From Shipwreck to Escape: Master Survival.

name: Dice Make 10!
summary:
New type puzzle uses dice and make 10.
Two modes of puzzles, “Inserting Puzzle” and “Falling Block Puzzle”, are available

name: Unicycle Pizza Time!
summary: Unicycle Pizza Time! is a rage inducing platformer where you navigate a dense cityscape without falling over.

name: Electric Fairyland
summary: Join Stix the fairy on an a tiny 3D adventure through the dense undergrowth of a fantasy garden. A bite-sized collectathon inspired by 90s platformers and childrens' picture books.

name: Pico Park 2
summary: PICO PARK is back with all new levels! Play with 2-8 players locally or online in this co-op action-puzzle game!

name: Castlevania Dominus Collection
summary: Three incredible action adventure games from the Castlevania series have finally returned, for the first time! But wait, there's more! Haunted Castle Revisited, a redesigned version of the very first Castlevania arcade game, makes its debut!

name: Animal Tower Battle
summary: A fun and easy battle game for all ages, with simple rules and controls, playable online and offline!

name: Shiren the Wanderer 6: Toguro Island Exploration Record Plus Pack
Doraemon's Dorayaki Shop Story
summary:
A game where you run a sweets shop with the popular manga character Doraemon. Let's make Doraemon's favorite dorayaki and create a store that will be the talk of the town.

First, make the sweets, set up the shelves, prepare the tables, and get ready to run the shop. In addition, various characters from Fujiko・F・Fujio's works will appear as customers.

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 3
summary: Confront the Conductor. Solve the mystery and put an end to the twisted machinations fighting for control of the Echoes.

name: Individualism In The Dead Internet Age: An Anti Big Tech Asset Flip
summary:
This is an interactive-essay-meets-walking-sim about technocapitalism and the things we lost along the way.
Follow coins under the electric mist of a clouded starry sky. Discover hyper-links. Listen to the words both inside and outside your head. Seal your fate before the productivity machine. Together we can defeat the machine.

name: Resident Fear 2
summary: Take part in heart-stopping first-person action with waves of ravenous zombies. Use your weapons wisely, keep your ammo count at bay, and stay focused—all decisions are literally matters of life and death.

name: Haunted Castle Revisited
summary:
Haunted Castle Revisited, a redesigned version of the very first Castlevania arcade game, makes its debut!

The game was released within the Castlevania Dominus Collection.

name: Along Came a Spider: Valley of The Hollow
Hoyeon
summary: Hoyeon tells a story that takes place three years prior to Blade & Soul, featuring a trendy reinterpretation and a fresh look in a radiant world. In this collectible RPG, put together a composition of unique heroes and use Hoyeon's unique switching feature to play in both turn-based mode and field battle mode.

name: Zero Zero: Perfect Stop
summary: Zero Zero: Perfect Stop is a train driving game for Playdate where you use the crank to control the train's throttle and brakes. Stop in the right place, at the right time. Maintain your timetable as you glide through scenic Yamanashi.

name: A Light Jog
summary: A Light Jog is a 2D endless runner game with 4 different places to travel through as you, the player, jog as long as you can while passing hazards that could stop you.

name: Pixel Boy 2: The Castle Revenge
summary:
Pixel Boy 2 is a continuation of the logic game, where you will find 96 completely new and difficult levels. The goal of the game is still the same. Move the red box to the goal field. This time it won't be so easy.

Creative thinking and problem solving is more than necessary to solve all levels. But do not worry! If you get stuck, you can always use the golden crown to skip a level.

Enjoy the new levels with new graphics and try to finish them all successfully without losing your crowns.

name: Epstein 2
summary: Join detective Michael in his psychological horror-filled adventure to gather evidence and find his mother on Epstein's dark island. In this single-player game, read notes carefully, collect equipment to protect yourself from aggressive test subjects, and uncover the truth...

name: D3ad Hand
summary:
Crack the code, feed the cat, save the world.
Yuri Spraytyvich has been selected for the role of Junior Strategic Missile Force Manager of Čerëmuški Command Post in Chita, Siberia.
His new position comes with a lot of responsabilities and he will need to deal with lack of maintenance, worker strikes, radioactive materials and PERIMETER, the soviet automatic defence system.
When PERIMETER receives by mistake the order to start the launch of the ballistic missile, it is up to Yuri to fix the problem and save the world from nuclear apocalypse.
D3AD HAND is a satirical Point and click comedy adventure game set during the cold war in a soviet bunker.

name: MInecraft: Stampy's Lovely World
summary:
The official map of Stampy’s Lovely World. A place that was built over ten years and has been seen by millions.
Explore the town, play in the funland and experience the places where countless stories have been told.

• Includes 100+ attractions in Stampy’s Funland!
• Visit the town and discover its many shops and activities!
• Explore locations where memories were made!

name: The Cummunist Manifesto: Dommy Mommy Commie Adventure
summary: The Cummunist Manifesto is a kinetic novel retelling of the classic Communist Work "The Communist Manifesto" by Karl Marx except Karl is now a busty babe.

name: Wladyslaw
summary: You are a citizen of the Władysław Empire. Sealed from the outside world by towering Walls you get mixed up in a ritual that changes your body. Now trapped in the Castle of Władysław only one thing is on your mind. Can you escape the Castle?

name: Yarimono: DLC 1
summary:
With this DLC you get:
Additional battles
Additional items
Bad ending scene

In addition to this, players can also watch the bad ending scene.
You can watch the story that happened within a few days after if the protagonist was defeated in the ruins event that appears in the main game.
After winning the battle, the main plot will be advanced.
※ The defeat will not have any impact on the story after the level is cleared.

name: Sheepers
summary: Take on the charming challenge of raising and nurturing a vibrant flock of sheepers.

name: Plants Huddled Together
summary: An interesting irregular puzzle game featuring beautiful plant illustrations. Come and relax with this game!

name: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawatareshi Toki
summary: The E15 release of Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawatareshi Toki.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow
summary:
A port of Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Draw the correct magic seal quickly, or your enemies will never die! Fight and explore through one of the largest castles ever seen in the series! Race another player through custom-made castle rooms in versus mode!

A year has passed since Soma Cruz discovered the evil of Dracula hidden inside his body. Now, a mysterious cult wants to release the power of the Lord of Darkness. As Soma, you must do everything in your power to stop them before it's too late.

name: Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin
summary:
A port of Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Explore exotic locales through portals created by the lord of the castle! Switch characters in the heat of action or fight side-by-side using the abilities of both heroes! Battle hordes of enemies and huge bosses in the quest to vanquish evil!

An ancient vampire threatens the fate of the world by utilizing Dracula's accursed castle and mystical paintings to open portals of Death. Battle together as Jonathan Morris, a young man who wields the legendary whip Vampire Killer, and Charlotte Aulin, a spellcaster with tremendous magical abilities. It's time to conquer evil in man's darkest hour.

name: Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia
summary:
A port of Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Use the brand new Glyph system with over 100 different attack combinations to battle Dracula and his minions throughout 20 explorable areas! Take part in side quests and collect items to power up! Experience a gripping storyline featuring new characters!

In the absence of the Holy Whip, those who live in fear of Dracula seek a replacement, which takes the form of the Order of Ecclesia, an organization that holds the secret to manipulating Glyphs. Shanoa, a young woman possessed with a unique ability to channel Glyphs, is chosen as our protector. This is her destiny and the story of the sacred Order of Ecclesia.

name: Flob and the Shattered Dimension
summary: Flob and the Shattered Dimension is a platformer game where you can test your skills while traversing various stages filled with challenging obstacles.

name: Metro Quester: Osaka
summary:
METRO QUESTER | OSAKA is a dungeon exploration RPG based in a post-apocalyptic futuristic world created by the manga artist Kazushi Hagiwara, with a deep game system designed by Hironori Kato that offers the excitement and surprises reminiscent of 1980s computer games through hack and slash.

Moving the location to the city of water, Osaka, it features 32 characters and 8 classes, enjoyable combo skills, numerous customizable weapons, a bestiary, and features like NEW GAME+ for replayability, offering plenty of depth for dedicated gamers.

name: Gulping Snake
summary: Gulping Snake is a simple, but not easy, 2D puzzle game.

name: Dust
summary: A Western by IkeC

name: Haunted Castle
summary:
A port of Haunted Castle included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Count Dracula sleeps for a long hundred of years. During this time, peace exists at the village and Dracula is nothing but a mere legend.

However, one day a young couple named Simon and Serena were celebrating their wedding at the village's church.

The couple were enveloped with happiness, as the wedding bells rang, their future seemed blessed...

Suddenly, the empty sky was covered with dark clouds and with a rolling thunder that shook the earth, Dracula has once again awakened. Asking for the beautiful girl's blood, he flew down during the middle of the wedding and suddenly took the bride with him.

Now in order to save Serena, Simon heads to the demon castle

name: Meat Jam
summary: A community map jam for Quake 1, where participants had a month to create a level focusing on meat. This pack contains 12 maps, including the start map. Runs on the Quoth mod, which is included, and adds new enemies, weapons, and powerups.

name: The Weight of Life: An Interactive Death Game of Judgement
summary: Invited to take part in a shady competition known as the Judge's Game, partners Lana and Percy must work together to survive. Alongside ten other participants, they must navigate three deadly weeks of alliances, betrayals, and drama - each bookended by a fatal judgement; Someone must be chosen as the least valuable and face execution. You assume the role of either Lana or Percy in this interactive visual novel, and who lives and who dies rests entirely in your judgement.

name: Mushroom Colors
summary: Mushroom Colors is an exciting endless jumping game where you play as a vibrant mushroom. Your goal is to ascend as high as possible, navigating through colorful obstacles. Each obstacle matches a specific color, and your mushroom can only pass through if it matches the obstacle's hue. Collect items to change your mushroom's color and continue your ascent. Test your reflexes and see how far you can go in this challenging and colorful adventure!

name: Pileup
summary: In PILEUP you play as a green square that is trying to rise up by substituting gray squares underneath it. Since reaching the top of the green square will end the game, you must prevent it from rising. Pink rectangles will fall from above and destroy all the blocks in their path, including you. Dodge them to live as long as possible and earn more points.

name: HeliCity Demolition Man
summary: Take control of a powerful demolition helicopter as you navigate through a high-stakes urban environment. Your mission? To strategically plant explosive charges in a towering construction site, all while facing off against new and unpredictable adversaries.

name: Bruma
summary:
Bruma is a game about Crossing into the sea and meeting a very big fish.
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2024 by the Coletivo Brejo.

name: >Meow
summary:
Play as a robot catgirl named K0tya who is trying to help her Master locate the missing lab rats (ignore the fact that said Master's forgetfulness is the reason they are missing in the first place).

Explore the research facility that you live in and find those missing critters before the morning shift starts, or your Master gets in trouble.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Drudging, Drifting, Dreaming
summary:
Version 7.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter IV: A Shore Under Watch
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Schicksal's Imperative (Theresa)
• New Featured Event: Born From A Dream
• ...and more!

name: Moemon Star Emerald
summary: Moemon Star Emerald is a ROM hack based on the Emerald Version.

name: Colorfire Redux
summary: Colorfire Redux is a beat the time game about a ship fighting against hordes of enemies.

name: Undertale Yellow: Dual
summary: Ever thought "Damn they did ma boy starlo dirty in the genocide route", yeah a lot of people did. well now we finally have a fight against him on this route in this fangame.

name: Constriction: 1024
summary: Based both on Congestion 1024 and Claustrophobia 1024, all the maps have a playable area of 1024x1024 Doom map units or less using OTEX. You can't escape the boundaries of the maps, but your enemies can.

name: Panic in the Woods
summary: A horror survival and extraction game playable in single player or co-op for up to 4 players. Lost in a creepy forest, you and your friends are hunted by a monster. Stay quiet while extracting keys through nightmarish realms using items like traps, sonars, and flare guns to survive!

name: Backrooms Media
summary: Backrooms Media is a multiplayer co-op exploration game that plunges you into unsettling, hyper-realistic liminal spaces. Navigate eerie environments filled with lurking horrors. Group up with your friends to face the terror of the endless backrooms together and... try to escape.

name: Mouse Knight: A hero's rising
summary: Explore the forest, complete quests and help villagers in this top down RPG

name: No Man's Sky: Aquarius
summary:
The Aquarius update to No Man's Sky adds Fishing to the game. Adding to the new water tech introduced in Worlds Update Part 1!

This includes new aquatic creatures to fish for, a new exo craft for players to utilise and various otehr additions including bait!

name: Wer weiß denn sowas?: Das 3. Spiel
G-Mode Archives+: Story of Seasons Mobile - Life & Love
summary: Story of Seasons Mobile - Life & Love has all the core features from the series: farming, ranching, mining, gardening, getting married, and exploring your local village. It was originally available on Docomo phones in Japan before being ported to Steam in September of 2024.

name: Art for Snakes
summary:
ART for Snakes is a single player snake-ish game by Splerp, Cheeseness, and lcl. Be a snake, eat the most expensive paintings you can before the time limit runs out.
"Our gallery provides snake-friendly access to all floors. Please do not climb on or touch the exhibits (unless nobody is watching)."
Use snake-like controls to move through and leap from painting to painting across a branching 4 course campaign.
ART for Snakes is intended to become challenging as it progresses, but for players who'd prefer a more relaxed experience, there is a "zen mode" available that removes time constraints.

name: Fill The Cup
summary: Main challenge lies in maneuvering the water stream around various obstacles that block the direct path to the glass. However, the player doesn't have an infinite supply of water. This means that players must use their resources wisely, ensuring they avoid unnecessary obstacles and carefully plan their water usage to collect all the stars and to make a happy glass full of water.

name: Fruboom
summary: Toss fruits to find their matching pairs! As you play, the fruits change color and become trickier to match, adding an exciting challenge. Designed with young players in mind, it’s a simple, kid-friendly experience perfect for even the littlest hands. Bright visuals and easy-to-understand gameplay make it a joyful adventure for all ages!

name: Digital Tamers 2
summary:
Tamers from all around the world, it's time to digitize once again!!
The long-awaited sequel to the acclaimed casual fighting fan game "Digital Tamers: ReBorn" is finally here!

Raise, battle, and evolve!
Embark on the Digital World and find new friends, adventures, and surprises! With more than 100 challenges, 50 unique quests, and more than 380 different Digimon to collect, the Digital World is yours to explore as you wish!

name: Blocks Challenge
summary:
Blocks Challenge is a game where you will have to use all your wisdom and skill to put together 3 or more pieces of the same number to make them increase.

The goal of the game is to make as many combinations as possible while you have room on the board.

The game has global rankings and monthly prizes.

name: Fruits' Harvest Sorter
summary: Sort the fruits of this season!

name: Boys Race
summary: You will have a long and difficult road to victory. You know it's better not to go it alone, right? Get your Boys together and get to the finish! Not everyone will make it, but those who do will help the others reach the finish line. It's a team effort and a team victory.

name: Ultimate Holidays
summary: Let’s start the Ultimate Holidays wherever you are!

name: Warzone Chronicles 2: Warfare Shooter Zombie
summary: Survive the Evolving Nightmare: Outsmart Zombies in a Cityscape of Ruin.

name: Dex & Akane
summary: Immerse yourself in a dystopian world with these grim action-packed titles!

name: Arcade Archives: Finalizer Super Transformation
summary: The ultimate defence war.

name: Finger Cuts
summary: Slice the shapes

name: FlipBook
summary: Unleash your creativity with Flipbook to create your own, unique stories.

name: Fragrant Story and Papaya's Path
summary: Smells like trouble! This tactical RPG puts a new spin on the classic genre, with characters from Otosan guided by Rhubarb and Papaya

name: Eggconsole Hydlide MSX
summary: Operate the hero Jim and defeat the demon Varalys, the strongest in mythology! A classic action RPG representing the 1980s.

name: Flick Erasers Battle Royale
summary:
It's a classwide eraser battle!
Be the last one surviving!
Get ready for a battle royale right on your desk!

name: Gold Digger: The Simulator
summary: Your Gold Rush Adventure Begins - Build Your Mining Empire.

name: Hole io & Helix Jump
summary: Here's the ultimate arcade bundle you've been waiting for! Eat & jump solo or with friends in multiplayer mode!

name: Make it! Crepe
summary:
It's time for a delicious crepe-making challenge!
Make as many as you can and watch your food cart prosper!

name: Ninja Girls: Kunoichi Puzzle
summary:
Cute ninja girls are here!
An easy puzzle game anyone can play

name: Sugoi Girls: Sassy Heroine
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Street Drag Racing Car Driving Simulator: Premium Edition
Let's Play! Oink Games - Complete Edition
Hentai Dating Stories: Brazil - Special Edition
Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Special Edition
summary:
The Gori : Cuddly Carnage Special Edition contains :

- The full game of Gori : Cuddly Carnage
- The Neon Neko Triple Skin Pack
- The Dragon Skin Pack
- The Day One Skin Pack

name: Snooker Blitz
summary:
Play snooker friends for free in Snooker Blitz. The only online snooker game you ever need.

The world is ready for a truly unique snooker game! Challenge your friends, enter snooker tournaments, and go head to head against other players in real-time. Shoot snooker with ultra-realistic physics, breath-taking graphics, and have more fun than you’ve ever had in real life!

name: Night of the Dead Simulator
summary:
Grab a weapon and follow us - doomsday is here, and time is running out!

The end of the human race is near. The zombie attack threatens our future, but there is hope. You, a soldier from the DELTA team, hold the cure in your hands. Will you be the one to save the world?

Use your weapons, search for and keep track of your ammo, and reach your objective several kilometers to the east. Hurry up and get a move on—time waits for no one.

Does anyone know how to dispatch a zombie? Face hordes of hundreds of zombies in an immersive bodycam experience.

Have some fun while you’re at it. Zombies are clumsy, and you're an expert in destruction, but don't forget that the end of the world is lurking around the corner. Make the most of what you’ve got around you!

name: Arcade Archives: Lead Angle
summary:
"LEAD ANGLE" is a gun shooting game released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1988. You control the main character, GEORGE PHOENIX, and fight against gangsters.

Use pistols, grenades, machine guns, and shotguns to defeat the big boss "KING in the final stage.

name: Around The World: Travel To Canada - Collector's Edition
Spooktober Visual Novel Jam!
summary: Help digital mascots Lime, Cherry, Plum and Lemon navigate their way through the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam competition. Laugh, learn, and scream(with excitement, we hope) through this visual novel and make choices to guide the girls to great success or dramatic failure!

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Visitors from Morta
summary: A window into another world has opened among the wastelands of the Worldwound

name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Memory Key
summary:
The official licensed anime adaptation of "Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card" invites you to embark on an adorable journey to collect little Sakura's treasures.

Chibi 3D Sakura is here with cuteness overload, experience the joy of collecting mystery boxes right on your mobile device!

name: Run from the Feds!
summary: Third person 3D platformer with the goal being get to the end as fast as possible.

name: Megaman X: Omega Blaster - Definitive Edition
summary: Megaman X Omega Blaster is an Arcade/Arena style fangame inspired by the classic saga arcades (Megaman: The power Battle & Megaman 2: The power fighters) but focused on the X saga but more dynamic, fun, challenging and with improved graphics.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Yellow
summary:
FNF: Yellow is a love letter to the hit fangame: Undertale Yellow!

In this mod you will sing with many familiar faces from UTY, as well as some extra guests from various parts of the UT/DR fandom.

name: Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster - Lights Out
summary: Get ready to dive back into the fast-paced world of Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster! This thrilling drilling game takes you on an exciting journey through unique biomes where danger lurks at every turn. In this chapter, Carton and Felicity have retrieved the Earth element, but their adventure is far from over. Now, they must brave the treacherous Lab Biome, a high-tech environment filled with perilous machines and cunning enemies determined to stop them from reaching their goal.

name: Harry Potter Quidditch Champions: Firebolt Supreme Broom Skin
House of Dead Skin
summary: Large, abstract and extremely beige single map set in an abstract beige facility built into abstract beige caves. The map is meant to be pretty nonlinear/explorable and large chunks of it are hidden in secrets and/or optional to the non-completionist. Texture theme/visuals and combat setups take a lot from Stardate 20X6 and The 10X10 Project (though it's not quite as hard as those wads.)

name: Blobun
summary: You are a blob bunny. Your goal? Touch every tile!

name: Ark: Aberration Ascended
summary: On Aberration, survivors face exotic and extreme challenges within a vast underground biome system upon a derelict, malfunctioning ARK. Survivors will uncover the ultimate secrets of the ARKs, and discover what the future holds in store for those strong and clever enough to survive!

name: Radical Problems
summary: A Half-Life 1 Modification where you play as a Scientist in Area 9 Hazardous Waste Facilities.

name: Bleeding Roots
summary: Bleeding Roots is a short horror walking simulator taking place throughout the seasons. Water the plants in your garden, learn about them, and grow along them over time. Immerse yourself in a story about loss, grief and obsession. The controls are simple, moving the character through tank controls and reading up on the environment with an interact key.

name: Rocket League: Season 16
summary:
Urban Legends Emerge from the Arena’s Darkest Depths.From the menacing Mothman to the chilling Chupacabra, ancient folklore revs to life in Rocket League Season 16!

Legendary monsters have been sighted on the field, but are they real or just an illusion? Turn up those headlamps and shine a light on the myths (and moths) of Rocket League Season 16 starting September 4!
⁠
⁠In Season 16, wade into the worrisome wilderness and compete in an all-new Arena, Drift Woods. And if things get too eerie, take comfort behind the wheel of Rocket League’s latest cars.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Drizzle Cat
summary:
In "Rooftop Rascal: The Drizzle Cat," you control a clever cat navigating city buildings' fire escape stairs to the rooftop.

The gameplay centers on jumps, and quick thinking.
Your goal is to climb as high as you can and reach the rooftop.

name: Fuu3: Minus3’s Lab
summary: Fuu3: Minus3’s Lab is a point-and-click game being created on the Clickteam Fusion 2.5 engine. Discover what you thought you knew about the titular Minus3, Fuu3’s sworn rival! Meet some extravagant characters, take systems down, and piece together who you were meant to be in this 2000s Newgrounds-inspired take on origin stories!

name: Real Cake Maker
summary: Grab your mixer and let the cake-making fun begin!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: The Willow Man
Eggconsole Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes PC-8801mkIISR
Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Neon Neko Triple Skin Pack
Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Day One Skin Pack
Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Chinese Dragon Premium Skin Pack
Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Change Skin Pack
The Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Expansion 6 - Faithful Friends
WitchSpring R: Costume - Silver Rose Set
WitchSpring R: Costume - Red Berry Set
WitchSpring R: Costume - Black Pearl Set
WitchSpring R: Costume - Shining Dawn Set
World of Tanks Blitz: Tier V Tank and Bonuses Pack!
Spot the Difference: Ukiyo-e Thirty-six Views of Mt. Fuji
Pinball FX: The Princess Bride Pinball
Some Some Convenience Store: Adela After Story
Some Some Convenience Store: After Stories Pass
South Park: Snow Day! - Bigger, Longer & Uncut Anniversary Pack
South Park: Snow Day! - Nonconformist Weapon Variation Pack
South Park: Snow Day! - To Danse with the Veiled Horde
WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Ancestral Garb Set: Berry
WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Fluffy Panda Suit
Just 1 Minute! Memory Test with Masterpieces
JettFuel
summary: In JettFuel, you play as Jett: a robot used by a factory until its sudden closure. You managed to escape the factory before it was destroyed, but the whereabouts of your brother and fellow coworker Brody, are unknown. In order to reunite with Brody, Jett must collect the Power Gems, which are scattered across many different areas, with some being held by bosses. The gems give the user the power to make one wish. There are also 3 hidden Caged Whisps, creatures made of pure light. in the game to try to find!

name: Bookworm
summary: Travel across Wonderland in this zen little typing game.

name: Grid Glyphs
summary: Grid Glyphs is a nonogram-style puzzle game for the Playdate.

name: Sonic Advance: Most Mods
summary: The MOST Mods are a collection of mods of the Sonic Advance's Android port that gives quality of life improvements to the game. These mods feature brand-new modifications and improvements alongside the previous ones from the Anniversary Mods Pack released back in 2021.

name: Tailwinds
summary:
Welcome to Tailwinds, a Pilotwings-inspired mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2,
featuring a story loosely based on the little-known Chuck Yeager origin story.

name: Mr. Triangle The Pizza Delivery Guy Mania Simulator 2k17 Turbo HD Remix GOTY 2024 Edition: Coked Up + 1.5 Collection DX Directors Cut & Knuckles
summary:
The first game in the Mr. Triangle Mania series (a sequel to some games I made as a child, of which the 6th entry was never finished), ported to the second's engine.
Including the extra story Mr. Triangle Mania 1.5, originally an SRB2 mod, now with its original intended ending.

name: Glowie Shooter
summary: They glow in the dark and they are coming to get you. You'll need to endure the relentless waves of upcoming glowies. Can you survive the night and get them before they get you?

name: Final Tank
summary: This is a top-down barrage shooting Roguelike game. You will experience driving a tank in a dangerous post apocalyptic wasteland to dodge enemy bullets and use weapons such as cannons and machine guns to defeat enemies and save the world

name: Stay Home It Rains Outside
summary: Your digital refuge at the Alpha Centauri settlement. Visit whenever things aren't going well. This is a productivity tool with game elements. Customize your second body, gather fluffy creatures, and tackle real-life tasks using built-in productivity features.

name: Almost Reversi
summary: This is a board game that combines deck building and Reversi. Buy powerful stones from the store and try to win 12 times within your time limit of 12 minutes!

name: The Cool Guys Are Level 100
summary: The goal of this game is in it's name. Hack and slash through randomized stages with 8 different playable characters each with their own unique playstyles. Will you be able to reach level 100 without dying and (possibly) become a cool guy?

name: VR Ninja Dojo
summary: VR NINJA DOJO offers an exciting training program that uses your entire body. Heated melee combat wielding swords, precise long-range attacks with shurikens, evasion training to dodge enemy attacks, and training to master ninjutsu await you.

name: Rabbit in Dungeon
summary: A Little Rabbit Battles Ruthless Skeletons! Escape the Grasps of Numerous Skeletons, Flee the Dungeon, and Reveal Hidden Secrets.

name: The No No Man
summary: A terrifying Indie horror experience with puzzle-platforming that will keep you on your toes as you find your way through the decrepit house. The only guidance you'll have going forward is your own wit and possibly the world's worst flashlight. But make no mistake, this is HIS house.

name: Chuzzo
summary: Drop pucks. Score points. It's Chuzzo time.

name: 8 Ball Goal
summary: Kick the white ball as best you can and score the goal before time runs out.

name: Floor 9
summary: In Floor 9, you find yourself trapped in a mysterious hotel known as "Hotel Liminal." To escape, you must identify anomalies on each floor. These anomalies can be anywhere - on the ground, in paintings, or even right in front of your eyes. You must check every corner carefully, as one mistake will send you back to the beginning, to Floor 9. The game offers you a unique blend of eerie atmosphere, puzzle-solving, and survival, all wrapped up in a psychologically thrilling experience.

name: Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 3.0
summary: An update for Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 3.0 that triples the content of the game, adding The Uncle Swordsman Story, with faster-paced gameplay, and a set of new bosses to go with it!

name: Hit of Chernobyl
summary: Hit of Chernobyl is a Survival FPS. The action takes place in the Zone, which was heavily polluted after a mysterious disaster. Marauders, journalists and just adventurers began to illegally enter the Zone. Many of them disappeared without a trace, and some lucky ones returned with unique artifacts.

name: Math Seeker
summary: Push the boxes and solve the math puzzles! Here, you will enjoy the charm of math seamlessly woven into the gameplay. A variety of boxes and mechanisms infused with mathematical elements await your discovery. Unleash your wit, unravel the game's secrets, and claim the crown of math!

name: Colorful Life Simulator
summary: Colorful Life Simulator is a life simulator that combines text and dynamic comics. In it, you can experience carefully arranged different lives by choosing different paths, from birth to old age, from construction sites to celebrities, and experience a complete and exciting random life!

name: Gokusaishiki Sushi Taisen: Proud Tradition vs. Crazy Imitation
summary: Fire your "shari" and deftly deflect their projectiles with "neta"!Utilize these two types of attacks to defeat the ultimate heretical sushi waiting at the deepest level!

name: J8 Princess Rhapsody
summary: Chinese love simulation, with different styles of female masters began a fantasy journey, and in the process of contact with them in-depth understanding.

name: Zoul Dungeon
summary: is a strategic dungeon defense game where you take on the role of a dungeon master. Summon monsters, upgrade your lair, and set traps to fend off waves of greedy adventurers. Protect your treasures and prove your worth as the ultimate dungeon overlord!
